RESUMEN AUTOMATICO

Resumen automático

'Constitutive' androstane receptor ( 'CAR),' a member of nuclear 'family,' plays an important role in cholesterol and bile acid metabolism. 'We' report that activation of 'CAR' decreases the biliary cholesterol concentration and prevents 'CGD' formation. 'The' lower biliary cholesterol level was largely attributed to suppressed 'Abcg5' and 'Abcg8' expression in 'CAR-activated' mice. 'CAR' activation also promoted cholesterol conversion into bile acids by increasing the expression of 'Cyp7a1,' a 'rate-limiting' enzyme in bile acid biosynthesis. 'Increased' adipocyte apoptosis was found in epididymal fat of 'T0901317-treated' 'HFD' mice. 'In' 'addition,' 'T0901317' treatment promoted basal 'lipolysis,' but blunted the 'anti-lipolytic' action of insulin. 'The' constitutive androstane receptor ( 'CAR)' and the pregnane 'X' receptor ( 'PXR)' have been established as predominant regulators for the inductive expression of 'CYP2B6' gene in human liver. 'Overall,' these findings indicate that 'HNF3β' represents a new liver enriched transcription factor that is involved in the transcription of 'CYP2B6' gene and contributes to the large interindividual variations of 'CYP2B6' expression in human population. 'Insulin' resistance is a common feature closely associated with human obesity and diabetes. 'Recently,' retinoids have been proposed to play roles in glucose and lipid metabolism and energy homeostasis. 'This' paper summarizes the recent progresses in our understanding of 'VA' metabolism in the liver and of the potential transcription factors mediating 'RA' responses. 'Treatment' with 'NEt-4IB' significantly suppressed the increase in static lung compliance and emphysematous changes in 'CSE-induced' emphysema and 'PPE-induced' established and progressive emphysema. 'These' data suggest that 'RXRs' play crucial roles in emphysema and airway 'inflammation,' and novel partial 'RXR' agonists could be potential therapeutic strategies for the treatment of 'PPE-' and 'CSE-induced' emphysema. 'Here' we address this by investigating sequence elements on 'DOR' that regulate 'DOR' surface 'delivery,' focusing on the 'C-terminal' tail of 'DOR' that is sufficient for 'NGF-mediated' regulation. 'Our' results suggest that interactions of 'DOR' with 'COPI,' via atypical 'COPI' motifs on the 'C-terminal' 'tail,' retain 'DOR' in the 'Golgi'. 'Multiple' environmental 'factors,' including food 'ingredients,' have been implicated in the development of these diseases. 'Among' many 'RXR-associated' nuclear 'receptors,' activation of peroxisome 'proliferator-activated' receptor δ ( 'PPARδ)' and nuclear hormone receptor 77 ( 'Nur77)' suppressed cytokine production by 'BMDMs'. 'Furthermore,' some studies have proposed that carotenoids may improve cognitive functions. 'Despite' individual intervention trials suggesting negative effects of high doses of 'β-carotene' on 'smokers,' perhaps due to effects related to cytochrome enzyme 'activation,' there is accumulating evidence that these colourful pigments indeed contribute to a healthy life and 'well-being'. 'S100A3' knockdown decreases the amounts of 'RARα' in 'breast-' and lung cancer 'cells,' inducing resistance to 'ATRA-dependent' 'anti-proliferative/differentiating' effects. 'Conversely,' 'S100A3' knockdown in 'PML-RARα+' 'APL' and 'PML-RARα-' 'AML' cells reduces the amounts of 'RARα/PML-RARα' and increases basal and 'ATRA-induced' differentiation. 'Distinct' 'RXR' genes lead to 'RXRα,' 'RXRβ' and 'RXRγ' 'subtypes,' but their specific roles in neuronal differentiation remain unclear. 'Importantly,' the inability of an alternative retinoid 'X' receptor ( 'RXR)' agonist to rescue 'ciliogenesis,' in contrast to 'bexarotene,' suggested that multiple 'bexarotene-driven' mechanisms were responsible for the rescue. 'A' significant increase in penile sheath length ( 'PsL)' and also in a developmental index ( 'DI)' was observed in 7-8 months old 'females,' as compared with 4-5 months old ones. 'As' 'homodimers,' 'RXRs' bind direct repeats of the 'half-site' ( 'A/G)G(G/T)TCA' separated by 1 nucleotide ( 'DR1)' and little variability of this consensus site is observed for natural 'DR1s'. 'However,' these variations are responsible of the modulation of 'RXR' receptors function through differential binding affinity and conformational changes.

lacks, a]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['PPRE,', was, not, responsive, to, exogenous, 'PPAR', expression, in, the, presence, of, bezafibrate])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings, show, that, verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, in, the, 'literature,', mostly, due, to, extravasation, of, drugs, in, patients, who, underwent, extended, resection, or, bladder, perforation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Data', implied, rifamycin, 'SV', '(', 20, 'µM)']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([three, 'OATPs,', while, rifampicin, '(', 5, 'µM)', inhibits, 'OATP1B1/1B3', only])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', previous, study, using, 'interleukin-1α/β-knockout', '(', 'IL-1-KO)', and, 'wild-type', '(', 'WT)', mice, demonstrated, that, 'IL-1']), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, positive, factor, for, constitutive, gene, expression, of, hepatic, cytochrome, 'P4507a1', '(', 'Cyp7a1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', to, clarify, the, role, of, 'IL-1', in, the, expression, of, the, hepatic, 'Cyp7a1', 'gene,', we, focused, on, 'Cyp7a1', transcriptional, regulators, such, as, 'α-fetoprotein', transcription, factor, '(', 'FTF),', liver, 'X', receptor, α, '(', 'LXRα),', hepatocyte]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, 4, α, '(', 'HNF4α)', and, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', and, examined, the, effects, of, 'IL-1', on, their, gene, expression, by, 'real-time', 'reverse-transcription', polymerase, chain, reaction, using, 'IL-1-KO', and, 'WT', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings, demonstrate, 'that,', like, 'TNF-α,', 'IL-1', positively, controls, the, gene, expression, of, 'Cyp7a1', transcriptional, upregulators, 'but,', in, contrast, to, the, previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([action, of, 'TNF-α,', 'IL-1', also, acts, to, downregulate, 'SHP', gene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Small', heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', plays, important, roles, in, diverse, biological, processes, by, directly]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([with, transcription, factors, and, inhibiting, their, activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['SHP']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, designated, an, orphan, nuclear, 'receptor,', but, whether, its, activity, can, be, modulated, by, ligands, has, been, a, 'long-standing', question])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', 'retinoid-related', 'molecules,', including, 4, -, '[', 3, -, '(', 1, -, 'adamantyl)-4-hydroxyphenyl]-3-chlorocinnamic', acid, '(', 3, 'Cl-AHPC),', were, shown, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, 'SHP', and, enhance, apoptosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, whether, 3, 'Cl-AHPC', acts, as, an, agonist, and, increases, 'SHP', activity, in, the, repression, of, bile, acid, biosynthetic, 'CYP7A1', and, 'CYP8B1', genes, and, delineated, the, underlying, mechanisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['Contrary', to, this, 'expectation,', micromolar, concentrations, of, 3, 'Cl-AHPC']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['CYP7A1', expression, but, indirectly, via, p38, kinase, signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nanomolar', 'concentrations,', 'however,']), verbo([repressed]), complemento(['CYP7A1', expression, and, decreased, bile, acid, levels, in, 'HepG2', 'cells,', and, little, repression, was, observed, when, 'SHP', was, 'down-regulated', by, small, hairpin, 'RNA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mechanistic', studies, revealed, that, 3, 'Cl-AHPC']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'SHP,', increased, the, interaction, of, 'SHP', with, liver, receptor, homologue, '(', increased, the, occupancy, of, 'SHP', and, these, cofactors, at, the, promoters])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutation', of, 'Leu-100,', predicted, to, contact, 3, 'Cl-AHPC', within, the, 'SHP', ligand]), verbo([binding]), complemento([pocket, by, molecular, 'modeling,', severely, impaired, the, increased, interaction, with, 'LRH-1,', and, repression, of, 'LRH-1', activity, mediated, by, 3, 'Cl-AHPC'])]). relacion([sujeto([3, 'Cl-AHPC']), verbo([repressed]), complemento(['SHP', metabolic, target, genes, in, a, 'gene-specific', manner, in, human, primary, hepatocytes, and, 'HepG2', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SHP', may, act, as, a, 'ligand-regulated', receptor, in, metabolic, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([reported]), complemento([previously, that, mice, overexpressing, cytochrome, 'P450', 7, a1, '(', 'Cyp7a1;', 'Cyp7a1-tg', 'mice)', are, protected, against, high, fat, 'diet-induced', 'hypercholesterolemia,', 'obesity,', and, insulin, resistance])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, investigated, the, underlying, mechanism, of, bile, acid, signaling, in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([cholesterol, homeostasis, in, 'Cyp7a1-tg', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Surprisingly,', hepatic, de, novo, cholesterol, synthesis, was, markedly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([in, 'Abcg5/g8', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', functional, 'FXR']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, was, identified, in, the, 'Abcg5', gene, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Study', of, 'tissue-specific', 'Fxr', knockout, mice, demonstrated, that]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, the, 'Fxr', gene, in, the, liver, attenuated, bile, acid, induction, of, hepatic, 'Abcg5/g8', and, verbo([increased]), complemento(['Cyp7a1', activity, expands, the, hydrophobic, bile, acid, 'pool,', stimulating, hepatic, cholesterol, synthesis, and, biliary, cholesterol, secretion, without, homeostasis, and, underscores, the, importance, of, bile, acid, signaling, in, regulating, overall, cholesterol, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Small', 'Heterodimer', 'Partner', '(', 'SHP)']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([numerous, transcription, factors, that, are, involved, in, diverse, biological, 'processes,', including, lipid, and, glucose, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, activity, of, 'SHP', is, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, posttranslational, methylation, at, 'Arg-57', by, protein, arginine, methyltransferase, 5, '(', 'PRMT5)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutation', of, 'Arg-57']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['SHP', interaction, with, its, known, 'cofactors,', 'Brm,', 'mSin3A,', and, histone, deacetylase, 1, '(', 'HDAC1),', but, not, with, 'G9a,', and, decreased, their, recruitment, to, 'SHP', target, genes, in, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hepatic', overexpression, of, 'SHP']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([metabolic, target, 'genes,', decreased, bile, acid, and, hepatic, triglyceride, 'levels,', and, increased, glucose, tolerance])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', mutation, of, 'Arg-57', selectively, reversed, the, inhibition, of, 'SHP']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, and, metabolic, outcomes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', importance, of, 'Arg-57', methylation, for, the, repression, activity, of, 'SHP']), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, molecular, basis, for, the, observation, that, a, natural, mutation, of, 'Arg-57', in, humans, is, associated, with, the, metabolic, we, show, that, the, phenotypic, consequences, in, mice, of, the, combined]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, both, receptors, are, much, more, severe, than, the, relatively, modest, impact, of, the, complemento([rCYP3A1, and, rCYP3A9, in, the, rat, 'jejunum,', ileum, and, 'colon,', rCYP3A2, only, in, the, 'ileum,', rCYP3A9, expression, in, the, 'liver,', and, 'CYP3A4', in, the, human, ileum, but, not, in, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['LCA']), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, expression, of, rMRP2, in, the, colon, but, not, in, the, jejunum, and, ileum, but, did, not, affect, rMRP3, relacion([sujeto(['In', rat, liver, 'slices,', 'LCA']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['rCYP7A1,', rLXRα, and, rHNF4α, 'expression,', induced, rSHP, 'expression,', but, did, not, affect, rBSEP, or, rNTCP, 'expression;', whereas, in, the, human, 'liver,', a, small, but, significant, decrease, was, found, for, hHNF1α, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([profound, species, differences, in, the, effects, of, 'LCA', on, bile, acid, 'transport,', synthesis, and, detoxification])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', hepatic, 'CYP7A1', mRNA, expression]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([significantly, '(', by, 70, '%', ')', in, the, patients, with, 'end-stage', 'PBC', as, compared, to, the, controls, and, the, patients, with, 'non-end-stage', 'PBC', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', hepatic, expression, of, transporters]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([bile, acid, influx, and, efflux, showed, sustained, 'elevation,', whereas, that, of, the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, for, bile, acid, biosynthesis, was, attenuated, in, the, 'end-stage', 'PBC', patients])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', mechanisms, may, be, present]), verbo([preventing]), complemento([the, accumulation, of, toxic, bile, acids, in, the, hepatocytes, of, 'end-stage', 'PBC', patients])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', significantly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, attenuated, 'LDL-C', reduction, and, variant, alleles, of, 'CETP', 'TaqI,', -, 629, 'C/A,', and, 'APOAI', 'PstI', polymorphisms, were, pathway, genes, are, associated, with, reduced, 'LDL-C', lowering, by, statins, and, identify, individuals, who, may, be, resistant, to, maximal, 'LDL-C', lowering, by, statins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Orphan']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, 'Small', 'Heterodimer', 'Partner', '(', 'SHP;', 'NR0B2)', is, a, transcriptional, corepressor, of, a, wide, variety, of, nuclear, receptors, '(', 'NRs)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'SHP', recruits, 'SIRT1,', a, class, 'III', histone, 'deacetylase,', in, an, 'NR-specific', manner, to, was, significantly]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([by, both, 'SHP', and, 'SIRT1', whereas, inhibition, of, 'SIRT1', activity, by, inhibitors, or, dominant, negative, 'SIRT1', or, knockdown, of, promoters, and, 'SIRT1', deacetylated, 'template-dependent', histone, 'H3', and, 'H4', to, inhibit, transcription, of, 'LRH1', target, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', we, demonstrated, that, sequestrants]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, lower, glucose, levels, in, patients, with, type, 2, diabetes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', rats, were, fed, 'HE;', 'HE', +, 2, '%', 'CL;', 'HE', +, 0.02, '%', 'SC-435', '(', 'SC),', an, apical, 'sodium-dependent', bile, acid, transporter, 'inhibitor;', and]), verbo([regular]), complemento([chow, '(', 'controls)'])]). complemento([in, the, 'HE', group, but, declined, significantly, both, in, the, 'CL', +, 'HE', and, 'SC', +, 'HE', groups, with, reduced, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, activation, compared, with, verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', 'LXRalpha,', liver, receptor, homolog, '(', 'LRH-1),', hepatocyte, nuclear, factor, 4, alpha, '(', 'HNF4alpha),', and, short, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', messenger, 'RNA', '(', 'mRNA)', and, coactivator, peroxisome, 'proliferators-activated', receptor, gamma, 'coactivator-1alpha', '(', 'PGC-1alpha)', mRNA, was, relacion([sujeto(['Investigation', of, a, repressive, signaling, 'pathway,', the, 'c-Jun-N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', signaling, pathway, in, 'PPd10', versus, 'controls,', showed]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([mRNA, expression, of, hepatocyte, growth, factor, '(', 'HGF;', decreased, 60, '%', at, 16, 'hours)', and, tyrosine, kinase, receptor, 'c-Met', '(', decreased, 44, '%', complemento([recruitment, of, 'LXRalpha,', a, 'Cyp7a1', stimulatory, 'pathway,', and, decreased, expression, of, 'FGF15', and, phosphorylated, 'Erk1/2,', a, 'Cyp7a1', repressive, 'pathway,', combined, to, increase, 'Cyp7a1', expression, during, lactation])]). relacion([sujeto(['BAs', are]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([in, the, 'hepatocytes,', secreted, into, bile, and, delivered, to, the, lumen, of, the, small, intestine, where, they, act, as, detergents, to, facilitate, absorption, of, fats, and, 'fat-soluble', vitamins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Five', percent, are, lost, and, replaced, by, newly]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento(['BAs,', which, amounts, to, approximately, 500, 'mg/day', in, adult, humans])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', acid, homeostasis, is, critical, in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([health, and, is, primarily, regulated, by, the, nuclear, receptors, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', and, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', 'acid-activated', 'FXR', indirectly]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([expression, of, cholesterol, 7, alpha, hydroxylase, '(', 'CYP7A1),', a, key, enzyme, in, conversion, of, cholesterol, to, bile, 'acids,', by, induction, of, 'SHP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', recently, demonstrated, that, 'SHP']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['CYP7A1', transcription, by, recruiting, 'chromatin-modifying', 'cofactors,', including, 'Brm-Swi/Snf'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Swi/Snf', complexes, contain, either, 'Brm', or, 'Brg-1', 'ATPases,', and, whether, these, subunits]), verbo([have]), complemento([distinct, functions, remains, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, the, role, of, these, subunits, in, regulation, of, bile, acid, metabolism, under, physiological, conditions, by, 'FXR', and, 'SHP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Brg-1']), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, 'FXR', and, enhanced, 'FXR-mediated', transactivation, of, 'SHP,', whereas, 'Brm', interacted, with, 'SHP', and, enhanced, 'SHP-mediated', repression, of, 'CYP7A1', 'and,', 'interestingly,', 'auto-repression', of, 'SHP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, and, remodeling, studies, revealed, that, after, treatment, with, 'FXR', 'agonists,', 'Brg-1', was]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, 'SHP', 'promoter,', resulting, in, transcriptionally, active, accessible, 'chromatin,', whereas, 'Brm', was, recruited, to, both, 'CYP7A1', and, 'SHP', 'promoters,', resulting, in, inactive, inaccessible, chromatin])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', studies, demonstrate, that, 'Brm', and, 'Brg-1']), verbo([have]), complemento([distinct, functions, in, the, regulation, of, two, key, 'genes,', 'CYP7A1', and, 'SHP,', within, a, single, physiological, 'pathway,', feedback, inhibition, of, bile, acid, 'biosynthesis,', by, differentially, targeting, 'SHP', and, 'FXR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['To']), verbo([gain]), complemento([insight, into, clock, output, functions, of, 'REV-ERBalpha,', we, carried, out, 'genome-wide', transcriptome, profiling, experiments, with, liver, 'RNA', from, 'wild-type', 'mice,', 'Rev-erbalpha', 'knock-out', 'mice,', or, 'REV-ERBalpha', overexpressing, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, basis, of, these, genetic, 'loss-', and, 'gain-of-function', 'experiments,', we, concluded, that, 'REV-ERBalpha']), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, the, circadian, modulation, of, sterol, regulatory, 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'SREBP)', 'activity,', and, thereby, in, the, daily, expression, of, 'SREBP', target, genes, involved, in, cholesterol, and, lipid, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['REV-ERBalpha', also]), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, the, cyclic, expression, of, 'cholesterol-7alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1),', the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, converting, cholesterol, to, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, this, control, acts, via, the, stimulation, of, 'LXR', nuclear, receptors, by, cyclically, produced, oxysterols])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', our, study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, rhythmic, cholesterol, and, bile, acid, metabolism, is, not, just, driven, by, alternating, 'feeding-fasting', 'cycles,', but, also, by, 'REV-ERBalpha,', a, component, of, the, circadian, clockwork, circuitry])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', proatherogenic, genotype, score, was, formulated, based, on, number, of, alleles]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'LDL-C', and, was, evaluated, for, association, with, risk, of, 'CAD'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', observed, 12, 'SNPs', from, 'CETP,', 'APOAI,', 'ABCB1,', 'CYP7A1,', and, 'HMGCR', genes, to, be]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, baseline, 'LDL-C', and, 'high-density', lipoprotein, cholesterol, levels, and, increased, risk, of, 'CAD', '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Co-occurrence', of, three, or, more, risk, alleles, '(', proartherogenic, genotype, score, &, 'gt;or=3)', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, increased, risk, of, 'CAD', and, myocardial, infarction])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', study, highlights, synergistic, association, of, multiple, 'SNPs', of, lipid, pathway, with, 'LDL-C', levels, and, risk, of, 'CAD,', and, indicates, that, 'co-occurrence', of, proatherogenic, risk, alleles, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([incremental, information, about, 'CAD', risk, beyond, lipid, concentrations])]). relacion([sujeto(['Intraluminal', concentrations, of, bile, acids, are, low, in, newborn, infants, and]), verbo([increase]), complemento([rapidly, after, 'birth,', at, least, partly, owing, to, increased, bile, acid, synthesis, rates])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', expansion, of, the, bile, acid, pool, is, critical, since, bile, acids, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, stimulate, bile, flow, and, absorb, 'lipids,', a, major, component, of, newborn, diets])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', purpose, of, the, present, studies, was, to, determine, the, mechanism, responsible, for, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, bile, acid, synthesis, rates, and, the, subsequent, enlargement, of, bile, acid, pool, sizes, '(', 'BAPS)', during, the, neonatal, 'period,', and, how, changes, in, circulating, hormone, levels, might, affect, 'BAPS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, 'hamster,', pool, size, was, low, just, after, birth, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([modestly, until, 10.5, days, postpartum, '(', 'dpp)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['BAPS']), verbo([increased]), complemento([more, significantly, '(', approximately, 3, -, 'fold)', between, 10.5, and, 15.5, dpp])]). relacion([sujeto(['An']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, mRNA, and, protein, levels, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp7a1),', the, 'rate-limiting', step, in, classical, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', immediately, preceded, an, increase, in, 'BAPS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', although, simultaneous]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, circulating, cortisol, and, 'Cyp7a1', levels, 'occurred,', precocious, expression, of, 'Cyp7a1', could, not, be, induced, in, neonatal, hamsters, with, dexamethasone])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus', the, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'Cyp7a1', levels, in, neonatal, hamsters, is, due, to, mechanisms, independent, of, the, 'FXR', and, 'SHP', pathway, and, cortisol])]). relacion([sujeto(['Peroxisome', 'proliferators,', such, as, the, 'lipid-lowering', fibrates, that, function, as, agonists, for, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, alpha, '(', 'PPARalpha),']), verbo([induce]), complemento([liver, tumors, in, rodents, and, may, produce, cholestasis, in, humans])]). relacion([sujeto(['Considerable', attention]), verbo([has]), complemento([focused, on, peroxisome, 'proliferator-induced', hepatocellular, 'carcinoma,', a, phenomenon, not, noted, in, 'man,', whereas, limited, studies, examine, fibrates, and, other, therapeutic, drugs, that, induce, 'cholestasis,', a, common, finding, in, humans])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', the, mechanisms, by, which, fibrates]), verbo([induce]), complemento([hepatocyte, proliferation, and, cholestasis, are, still, not, fully, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, the, role, of, hepatocyte, retinoid, 'X', receptor, alpha, '(', 'RXRalpha),', an, essential, partner, of, 'PPARalpha,', in, modulating, 'WY-14,643-induced', hepatocyte, proliferation, and, cholestasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['WY-14,643', treatment]), in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['WY-14,643-mediated', cell, cycle, progression, as, well, as, bile, acid, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mouse', fibroblast, growth, factor, 15, '(', complemento([the, mRNA, levels, of, 'SHP', to, 298, '%', +, /, -, 43, '%', and, 273, '%', +, /, -, 30, '%', of, 'controls,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'glycine-conjugated', and, free, bile, acids]), verbo([suppress]), complemento([bile, acid, synthesis, and, mRNA, levels, of, 'CYP7A1', in, the, order, 'CDCA', &, 'gt;', 'DCA', &, 'gt;', 'CA', &, 'gt;', 'UDCA'])]). relacion([sujeto([mRNA, levels, of, 'CYP8B1', and, 'CYP27A1', are]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([to, a, much, lower, degree, than, 'CYP7A1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', aromatase, knockout, '(', 'ArKO)', mouse, cannot]), verbo([synthesize]), complemento([endogenous, estrogens, due, to, disruption, of, the, 'Cyp19', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, 'previously,', that, 'ArKO', mice, present, with, 'age-progressive', obesity, and, hepatic, 'steatosis,', and, by, 1, yr, of, age, both, male, and, female, 'ArKO', mice, develop, hypercholesterolemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', expression, of, 'Cyp7a,', which, encodes, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', was, significantly, reduced, in, 'ArKO', females, compared, with, 'wild-type', females, and, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, cholesterol, feeding])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'ATP-binding', cassette, 'G5', and, 'ATP-binding', cassette, 'G8', transporters, do, not, appear, to, be]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, estrogen])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', expression, of, 'acyl-coenzyme', 'A:cholesterol', acyltransferase, 2, showed, a, sexually, dimorphic, 'response,', where, estrogen, appeared, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, stimulatory, effect, in, 'females,', but, not, males])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, sexually, dimorphic, difference, in, mouse, hepatic, cholesterol, homeostasis, and, roles, for, estrogen, in, the, regulation, of, cholesterol, 'uptake,', 'biosynthesis,', and, catabolism, in, the, 'female,', but, not, in, the, male])]). relacion([sujeto(['Small', heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', is, an, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, can, modulate, the, activity, of, several, transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Estrogens', are, here, shown, to, directly]), verbo([induce]), complemento([expression, of, the, 'SHP', in, the, mouse, and, rat, liver, and, in, human, 'HepG2', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['SHP', is, rapidly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([within, 2, h, following, treatment, of, mice, with, ethynylestradiol, '(', 'EE)', or, the, estrogen, receptor, alpha, '(', 'ERalpha)-selective', compound, propyl, pyrazole, triol, '(', 'PPT)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutation', of, the, human, 'SHP', promoter, defined, 'HNF-3,', 'HNF-4,', 'GATA,', and, 'AP-1', sites, as, important, for, basal, 'activity,', whereas, 'EE', induction]), verbo([required]), complemento([two, distinct, elements, located, between, -, 309, and, -, 267])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', of, these, elements, contains, an, estrogen, response, element, 'half-site', that]), verbo([bound]), complemento([purified, 'ERalpha,', and, 'ERalpha', with, a, mutated, 'DNA', binding, domain, was, unable, to, stimulate, 'SHP', promoter, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', 'ERalpha']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, overlaps, the, known, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', binding, site, in, the, 'SHP', 'promoter,', and, the, combination, of, 'EE', plus, 'FXR', agonists, did, not, produce, an, additive, induction, of, 'SHP', expression, in, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Surprisingly,', induction, of, 'SHP', by, 'EE', did, not]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([expression, of, the, known, 'SHP', target, genes, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', or, sterol, 12, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP8B1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, direct, regulation, of, 'SHP', expression, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, basis, for, some, of, the, numerous, biological, effects, of, estrogens])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', acids]), verbo([activate]), complemento([a, nuclear, 'receptor,', farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR),', that, induces, bile, salt, export, pump, '(', 'BSEP)', but, inhibits, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', gene, transcription, in, the, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['Guggulsterone,', a, plant, sterol, that, lowers, serum, 'cholesterol,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, antagonize, 'FXR', activated, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Transient', transfection, assay, of, a, human, 'BSEP/luciferase', reporter, in, 'HepG2', cells, transfected, with, 'FXR']), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, guggulsterone, strongly, antagonizes, bile, acid, induction, of, the, 'BSEP', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', guggulsterone]), verbo([has]), complemento([no, effect, on, 'FXR', inhibition, of, the, 'CYP7A1', 'gene,', but, strongly, inhibits, the, human, 'CYP7A1', gene, by, activation, of, pregnane, 'X', receptor, '(', 'PXR)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, guggulsterone, inhibits, bile, acid, secretion, from, hepatocytes, into, bile, and, activates, 'PXR', to, inhibit, bile, acid, synthesis, in, the, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['Reduced', conversion, of, cholesterol, and, bile, acid, excretion, may]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, an, increase, of, hepatic, cholesterol, and, decrease, of, intestinal, cholesterol, 'absorption,', and, results, in, lowering, serum, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', in, the, current, 'study,', using, real, time, 'PCR', we, compared, the, mRNA, expression, of, 'ABC', transporters, and, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, cholesterol, metabolism, in, liver, 'parenchymal,', 'endothelial,', and, 'Kupffer', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', endothelial, cells, show, a, high, expression, of, cholesterol, 27, -, 'hydroxylase,', liver, 'X', 'cells,', the, expression, level, of, 'LXRalpha,', 'ABCA1,', and, in, particular, 'ABCG1', is, 'high,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, an, 'ABCG1', mRNA, expression, level, that, is, 70, -, fold, higher, than, in, parenchymal, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', can, be, calculated, that, 51, '%', of, the, total, liver, 'ABCG1', expression, resides, in, 'Kupffer', cells, and, 24, '%', in, endothelial, 'cells,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([an, 'intrahepatic-specific', role, for, 'ABCG1', in, 'Kupffer', and, endothelial, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Because', of, a, specific, 60, '%'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, hepatic, bile, salt, transporters, is, partly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, bile, salts, via, activation, of, nuclear, farnesoid, a, wide, range, of, '\'', 'physiological\'', bile, salt, fluxes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, 'proteins,', 'ABCA1', and, 'ABCG1,', may]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([an, active, efflux, of, cellular, cholesterol, and, phospholipids])]). relacion([sujeto(['They', are, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([and, are, subject, to, regulation, by, cholesterol, loading, or, by, treatment, with, agents, that, activate, the, nuclear, hormone, receptor, 'LXR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Earlier', studies, in, both, primates, and, 'non-primates']), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, treatment, with, endotoxin, '(', bacterial, 'lipopolysaccharide,', 'LPS)', reduces, plasma, levels, of, 'HDL', cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['LPS', relacion([sujeto(['Further', studies, showed, that, treatment, with, 'Rhodobacter', sphaeroiders, 'LPS,', an, 'LPS', 'antagonist,', or, 'PD169316,', a, specific, p38, 'MAP', kinase, 'inhibitor,']), the, hepatic, parenchymal, cells]), verbo([express]), complemento(['cholesterol-7', 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', which, regulates, the, conversion, of, cholesterol, into, bile, 'acids,', the, complemento([the, accumulation, of, cholesterol, when, they, were, incubated, with, 'acetyl-LDL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', single, cell, clone, '(', designated, as, 7, alphaRAW, 'cells)', that, stably]), verbo([expresses]), complemento([rat, 'CYP7A1', displayed, similar, rates, of, growth, as, 'non-transfected', 'RAW', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'CYP7A1', enzymatic, activity]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([by, microsomes, obtained, from, 7, alphaRAW, cells, was, similar, to, that, expressed, by, microsomes, obtained, from, mouse, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['Incubating', 'non-transfected', 'RAW', with]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([amounts, of, 'acetyl-LDL', caused, a, parallel, accumulation, of, 'cholesterol,', whereas, 7, alphaRAW, cells, displayed, a, complete, resistance, to, cholesterol, accumulation])]). relacion([sujeto([7, alphaRAW, cells, displayed]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, both, 'ABCA1', mRNA, '(', 3.1, -, 'fold,', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')', and, 'ABCG1', mRNA, '(', 2.2, -, 'fold,', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', ',', whereas, the, expression, of, scavenger, receptor, class, 'A', mRNA, was, unchanged])]). relacion([sujeto([7, alphaRAW, cells, also, displayed, small, but, significant]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, the, rate, of, efflux, of, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]cholesterol', to, both, delipidated, apolipoprotein, 'A1', and, to, 'HDL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', 'CYP7A1', expression, in, 'RAW', cultured, macrophages]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, accumulation, of, cholesterol, from, 'acetyl-LDL', via, both, increased, metabolism, and, efflux, of, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptor, liver, receptor, homologous, 'protein-1', '(', 'LRH-1;', 'NR5A2,', also, known, as, 'FTF),', an, unusual, receptor, that, binds, 'DNA', as, a, 'monomer,', is, an, loop, that, is, a, crucial, component, of, the, complex, regulation, of, cholesterol, 'metabolism,', cholesterol, 7, -, 'alpha-hydroxylase', expression, is]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([when, bile, acid, levels, are, high])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', repression, is, thought, to, be, based, on, the, bile, 'acid-dependent', induction, of, expression, of, the, orphan, receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', 'NR0B2,', which]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, activity, of, 'LRH-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([explored, the, molecular, basis, for, this, important, regulatory, effect, by, characterizing, the, mechanisms, by, which, mouse, and, human, 'SHP', inhibit, 'LRH-1-mediated', transactivation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', 'SHP', proteins, specifically]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, 'AF-2', transactivation, domain, of, 'LRH-1', both, in, vivo, and, in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', domain, is, a, common]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, coactivator, 'interaction,', and, the, 'SHP', proteins, can, compete, with, p160, coactivators, for, binding, to, 'LRH-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Neither', a, deletion, nor, a, point, mutation, specifically, affecting, this, domain, blocked, the, ability, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'LRH-1', to, compete, for, coactivator, binding, or, to, repress, 'LRH-1', transactivation])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, relative, ability, of, these, mutants, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['LRH-1-mediated', transactivation, was, markedly, decreased])]). relacion([sujeto(['During', fasting, and, in, type, 'I', 'diabetes,', elevated, levels, of, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, 'gamma-coactivator-1alpha', '(', 'PGC-1alpha)']), verbo([induce]), complemento([expression, of, the, 'Cyp7A1', gene, and, overexpression, of, 'PGC-1alpha', in, hepatoma, cells, stimulates, bile, acid, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', 'Ad-PGC-1alpha-RNA', interference, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([acute, disruption, of, 'PGC-1alpha', in, 'mice,', here, we, show, that, 'PGC-1alpha', is, necessary, for, 'fasting-mediated', induction, of, 'CYP7A1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Co-immunoprecipitation', and, promoter, activation, studies]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, the, induction, of, transactivation, of, 'PGC-1alpha', and, 'LRH-1', is]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([by, the, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Treatment', of, mice, with, 'GW4064,', a, synthetic, agonist, for, farnesoid, 'X', 'receptor,']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['SHP', expression, and, decreased, both, the, recruitment, of, 'PGC-1alpha', to, the, 'Cyp7A1', promoter, and, the, 'fasting-induced', expression, of, 'CYP7A1', mRNA])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'PGC-1alpha', is, an, important, 'co-activator', for, 'LRH-1', and, that, 'SHP', targets, the, interaction, between, 'LRH-1', and, 'PGC-1alpha', to, inhibit, 'CYP7A1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overall,', these, studies]), verbo([provide]), complemento([further, evidence, for, the, important, role, of, 'PGC-1alpha', in, bile, acid, homeostasis, and, suggest, that, pharmacological, targeting, of, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, in, vivo, can, be, used, to, reverse, the, increase, in, 'CYP7A1', associated, with, adverse, metabolic, conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Literature']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, glucocorticoid, '(', 'GC)', exposure, during, early, life, may, have, 'long-term', consequences, into, adult, life])]). relacion([sujeto(['DEX', acutely]), verbo([induced]), complemento([hepatic, mRNA, levels, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp7a1),', cholesterol, 27, -, hydroxylase, '(', 'Cyp27),', and, in, particular, sterol, 12, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp8b1),', whereas, expression, of, the, bile, acid, transporters, bile, salt, export, pump, '(', 'Bsep)', and, sodium, taurocholate, cotransporting, polypeptide, '(', 'Ntcp)', was, moderately, affected])]). relacion([sujeto(['Neonatal', 'DEX', administration]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, increased, bilary, lipid, 'secretion,', decreased, 'Cyp8B1', mRNA, expression, and, a, 3, -, fold, higher, 'Cyp7a1/Cyp8b1', mRNA, ratio, in, rats, at, week, 8, compared, with, 'age-matched', controls, without, alterations, in, bile, acid, kinetics])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', neonatal, 'DEX', administration]), verbo([causes]), complemento([altered, gene, expressions, later, in, life, that, are, not, translated, into, quantitative, changes, in, bile, acid, kinetics])]). relacion([sujeto(['Maximal', bile, acid, secretory, rates, and, expression, of, bile, acid, transporters, in, liver, and, ileum, are]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'lactation,', possibly, to, facilitate, increased, enterohepatic, recirculation, of, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', bile, acid, pool]), verbo([increased]), complemento([1.9, to, 2.5, -, fold, '[', postpartum, '(', 'PP)', days, 10, ',', 14, ',', and, 19, -, 23, ']', ',', compared, with, controls])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', 1.5, -, fold]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, cholic, acids, and, a, 14, to, 20, '%', decrease, in, muricholic, acids, in, lactation, significantly, increased, the, hydrophobicity, index])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', 2.8, -, fold]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'Cyp7a1', mRNA, expression, at, 16, h, '(', 10, h, of, 'light)', demonstrated, a, shift, in, the, diurnal, rhythm, at, day, 10, 'PP;', 'Cyp7a1', protein, expression, and, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', overall]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'Cyp27a1', mRNA, expression, and, a, 20, '%', decrease, in, 'Cyp27a1', protein, 'expression,', but, there, was, no, change, in, 'Cyp8b1', mRNA, or, protein, expression, at, day, 10, 'PP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'Cyp7a1', expression, 'PP', provides, a, mechanism, for, the, increase, in, the, bile, acid, pool])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', receptor, homolog, 1, '(', 'LRH-1)', is, a, key, transcriptional, factor]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, hepatic, expression, of, 'CYP7A1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, 'LRH-1', was, also]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, transcriptional, regulation, of, 'BSEP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', support, of, our, 'hypothesis,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, overexpression, of, 'LRH-1', 'induced,', whereas, knockdown, of, 'LRH-1', 'decreased,', 'BSEP', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', such, transactivation, by, 'LRH-1', was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, maximal, induction, of, 'BSEP', expression, through, the, bile, 'acid/farnesoid', 'X', receptor, '(', transcriptionally]), verbo([activated]), complemento([the, 'BSEP', promoter, and, functioned, as, a, modulator, in, bile, 'acid/FXR-mediated', 'BSEP', regulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'LRH-1', plays, a, supporting, role, to, 'FXR', in, maintaining, hepatic, bile, acid, levels, by, coordinately, regulating, 'CYP7A1', and, 'BSEP', for, 'liver,', 'DHT', did, not, alter, the, expression, of, most, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cholesterol, synthesis, or, uptake, but, rapidly, increased, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', in, monkey, adipose, 'tissue,', whereas, its, inhibitor, apolipoprotein, 'CI', was, repressed])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insight, into, the, androgenic, regulation, of, lipoprotein, homeostasis, and, suggest, that, changes, in, adipose, lipoprotein, metabolism, could, contribute, to, 'HDL', cholesterol, reduction])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', humans, and, 'mice,', low, plasma, levels, of, 'PON1']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, been, linked, to, the, development, of, atherosclerosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, hepatic, 'Pon1', expression, was, decreased, when, 'C57BL/6J', mice, were, fed, a, 'high-fat,', 'high-cholesterol', diet, supplemented, with, cholic, acid, '(', 'CA)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['PON1', mRNA, levels, were, also]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([when, 'HepG2', 'cells,', derived, from, a, human, 'hepatoma,', were, incubated, with, natural, or, highly, specific, synthetic, 'FXR', agonists])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', fibroblast, growth, 'factor-19', '(', 'FGF-19)', mRNA, levels, were, greatly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, these, same, 'FXR', agonists])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', treatment, of, 'HepG2', cells, with, recombinant, human, 'FGF-19', significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['PON1', mRNA, levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data, demonstrate, that, human, 'PON1', expression, is]), verbo([repressed]), complemento([by, bile, acids, through, the, actions, of, 'FXR', and, 'FGF-19'])]). relacion([sujeto(['As', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([by, 'us,', mice, with, targeted, disruption, of, the, 'CYP8B1', gene, '(', 'CYP8B1-/-)', fail, to, produce, cholic, acid, '(', 'CA),', upregulate, their, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', reduce, the, absorption, of, dietary, cholesterol, 'and,', after, cholesterol, 'feeding,', accumulate, less, liver, cholesterol, than, 'wild-type', '(', 'CYP8B1+/+)', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cholesterol-fed', 'CYP8B1-/-', mice, also, showed, a, significant, rise, in, 'HDL', cholesterol, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, liver, 'ABCA1', mRNA])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', combined, 'CA', '(', 0.25, '%', ')', /, cholesterol, '(', 0.5, '%', ')', diet]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([absorption, of, intestinal, cholesterol, in, both, groups, of, 'mice,', increased, their, liver, cholesterol, 'content,', and, reduced, their, expression, of, 'CYP7A1', mRNA])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'ABCG5/G8', liver, mRNA, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, both, groups, of, 'mice,', but, cholesterol, crystals, were, only, observed, in, bile, from, the, 'CYP8B1+/+', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', results, demonstrate, the, 'cholesterol-sparing', effects, of, 'CA:']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([absorption, and, reduced, conversion, into, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interaction', between, 'FXR-', and, 'LXR-mediated', stimuli, might, also]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([expression, of, liver, 'ABCG5/G8'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', gene, encoding, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1)', is, tightly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, order, to, control, intrahepatic, cholesterol, and, bile, acid, levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ligands', of, the, 'xenobiotic-sensing', pregnane, 'X', receptor]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['CYP7A1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', retrace, the, evolution, of, the, molecular, mechanisms, underlying, 'CYP7A1', 'inhibition,', we, used, a, chicken, hepatoma, cell, system, that]), verbo([retains]), complemento([the, ability, to, be, induced, by, phenobarbital, and, other, drugs])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whereas', bile, acids]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['CYP7A1', via, small, heterodimer, partner, and, liver, receptor, 'homolog-1,', mRNA, expression, of, these, nuclear, receptors, is, unchanged, by, xenobiotics])]). relacion([sujeto(['Instead,', drugs]), verbo([repress]), complemento([chicken, hepatic, nuclear, factor, 4, alpha, '(', 'HNF4alpha)', transcript, levels, concomitant, with, a, reduction, in, 'CYP7A1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Importantly,', no, reduction, of, 'HNF4alpha', levels, is]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, mouse, liver, in, vivo, and, in, human, primary, hepatocyte, 'cultures,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, 'anti-inflammatory', effect, of, 'interleukin-1', '(', 'IL-1)', receptor, antagonist, '(', 'IL-1Ra)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, 'described,', the, contribution, of, this, cytokine, to, cholesterol, metabolism, remains, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['Real-time', 'PCR', analysis, revealed, that, 'IL-1Ra(-/-)', mice, failed, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([mRNA, expression, of, cholesterol, 7, 'alpha-hydroxylase,', which, is, the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', with, concurrent, 'up-regulation', of, small, heterodimer, partner, 1, mRNA, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Indeed,', 'IL-1Ra(-/-)', mice, showed, markedly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([bile, acid, 'excretion,', which, is, elevated, in, 'WT', mice, to, maintain, cholesterol, level, under, atherogenic, diet, feeding])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', studies, show, that, feedback, inhibition, of, bile, acid, production, by, bile, acids, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, multiple, 'mechanisms,', including, activation, of, pregnane, 'X', receptor, '(', 'PXR)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', delineate, the, mechanisms, underlying, 'PXR-mediated', suppression, of, bile, acid, 'biosynthesis,', we, examined, the, functional, 'cross-talk', between, human, 'PXR', and, 'HNF-4,', a, key, hepatic, activator, of, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, bile, acid, biosynthesis, including, the, cholesterol, 7, -, alpha, hydroxylase, '(', 'CYP7A1)', and, sterol, 12, -, alpha, hydroxylase, '(', 'CYP8B1)', genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', coactivator, 'PGC-1']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([transcriptional, activity, of, 'HNF-4,', and, this, enhancement, was, suppressed, by, 'rifampicin-activated', 'PXR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Endogenous', 'PGC-1', from, mouse, liver, extracts]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'PXR,', and, recombinant, 'PGC-1', directly, interacted, with, both, 'PXR', and, 'HNF-4', in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rifampicin-dependent', interaction, of, 'PXR', with, 'PGC-1', was, shown, in, cells, by, 'coimmunoprecipitation,', and, intranuclear, localization, studies, using, confocal, microscopy]), verbo([provided]), complemento([further, evidence, for, this, interaction])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', chromatin, immunoprecipitation, 'studies,', rifampicin, treatment, did, not]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['HNF-4', binding, to, the, native, promoters, of, 'CYP7A1', and, 'CYP8B1', but, resulted, in, dissociation, of, 'PGC-1', and, concomitant, gene, repression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'ligand-activated', 'PXR', interferes, with, 'HNF-4', signaling, by, targeting, the, common, coactivator, 'PGC-1,', which, underlies, physiologically, relevant, inhibitory, 'cross-talk', between, drug, metabolism, and, 'cholesterol/glucose', metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', orphan, receptor, 'SHP']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, many, nuclear, receptors, and, inhibits, their, transcriptional, activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['SHP', is, central, to, feedback, repression, of, cholesterol, 7, alpha, hydroxylase, gene, '(', 'CYP7A1)', expression, by, bile, 'acids,', which, is, critical, for]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([cholesterol, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, studies, showed, that, mSin3A, and, a, 'Swi/Snf', complex, containing, 'Brm', as, a, central, 'ATPase', were]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', recruitment, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, chromatin, remodeling, after, bile, acid, treatment, that, was, blunted, by, inhibition, of, the, endogenous, 'Swi/Snf', function, by, 'dominant-negative', 'ATPase', mutants])]). relacion([sujeto(['Biochemical', studies, indicated, that, 'SHP', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, 'mSin3A-Swi/Snf', complex, by, direct, interaction, with, 'Brm', and, mSin3A, through, its, repression, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, 'Brm,', but, not, an, 'ATPase', 'mutant,']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['CYP7A1', promoter, activity, and, further, enhanced, 'SHP-mediated', repression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', 'acid-induced', recruitment, of, 'mSin3A/Brm,', chromatin, 'remodeling,', and, concomitant, repression, of, endogenous, 'CYP7A1', expression, were, impaired, when, 'SHP', expression, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'SHP', small, interfering, 'RNA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SHP', mediates, recruitment, of, 'mSin3A-Swi/Snf', to, the, 'CYP7A1', 'promoter,', resulting, in, chromatin, remodeling, and, gene, 'repression,', which, may, also, be, a, mechanism, for, the, repression, by, 'SHP', of, genes, activated, by, many, nuclear, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cholesterol', excretion, by, 'ATP']), verbo([binding]), complemento([cassette, transporters, 'G5', and, 'G8', '(', 'ABCG5/G8)', and, allele, was, significantly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, a, greater, 'LDL', cholesterol, reduction, relative, to, the, wild, type, 'D19', allele, '(', 39.6, '%', versus, 36.6, '%', ',', 'P', =, 0.043, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', difference, was]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([in, 'non-carriers', of, the, 'CYP7A1', promoter, polymorphism, '(', 42.7, '%', versus, 38.2, '%', ',', 'P', =, 0.048, ')', ',', and, was, diminished, in, accordance, with, the, number, of, 'CYP7A1', variant, alleles, '(', 1.8, '%', in, heterozygotes, and, 0.2, '%', in, 'homozygotes)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', conclude, that, the, 'ABCG8', 'H19', and, 'CYP7A1', 'C-204', alleles, appear, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner, on, atorvastatin, response])]). relacion([sujeto(['β-Glucan,', a, soluble, fiber, with, viscous, 'property,']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, documented, 'cholesterol-lowering', effect])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', relacion([sujeto(['This', effect, of, 'HMW', 'β-glucan', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'gene-diet', 'interaction,', whereby, individuals, with, the, single, nucleotide, polymorphism, 'β-glucan/d', in, lowering, 'TC', than, 'TT', carriers, '(', 'P=', 0.0006, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Despite', that, quercetin, is, implicated, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([cholesterol, 'metabolism,', the, molecular, mechanism, is, poorly, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, quercetin]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([cholesterol, homeostasis, through, quercetin])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, quercetin, treatment, significantly, increased, 'ATP', binding, cassette, transporter, 'G1', mRNA, and, protein, expression, in, the, 'liver,', suggesting, that, quercetin, may, increase, hepatic, cholesterol, efflux])]). relacion([sujeto(['Collectively,', the, results, presented, here, indicate, that, quercetin]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([hepatic, cholesterol, metabolism, mainly, through, the, pathways, that, promote, 'cholesterol-to-bile', acid, conversion, and, cholesterol, efflux])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, utilized, male, mice, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, 27, 'OH', either, due, to, increased, production, '(', 'CYP27A1', transgenic, 'mice)', or, reduced, metabolism, '(', 'Cyp7b1-/-', 'mice)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, liver, of, 'CYP27tg', mice, we]), verbo([found]), complemento([a, modest, increase, of, the, mRNA, levels, corresponding, to, the, 'LXR', target, genes, 'Cyp7b1', and, 'Abca1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, liver, of, the, 'Cyp27-/-', mice, treated, with, 0.025, '%', cholic, acid, there, was, no, significant, effect, of, the, knockout, on, the, 'LXR']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', a, previous, work, 'triple-knockout', mice, deficient, in, the, biosynthesis, of, 24, 'S-hydroxycholesterol,', 25, -, hydroxycholesterol, and, 27, 'OH', were, shown, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([impaired, response, to, dietary, 'cholesterol,', suggesting, 'side-chain', 'Srebp1c', in, wild, type, mice, but, failed, to, activate, the, same, genes, in, mice, lacking, 27, -, hydroxycholesterol, due, to, a, knockout, of, 'Cyp27'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 27, 'OH', is, not, an, important, regulator, of, 'Srebp-', or, 'LXR', regulated, genes, under, basal, conditions, in, mouse, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, hand, 27, 'OH', appears, to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['cholesterol-induced', effects, on, some, 'LXR', target, genes, at, a, transcriptional, level, under, some, in, vivo, conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hypoxic', stress, changes, the, transcription, of, several, genes, by]), verbo([activating]), complemento([a, heterodimeric, transcription, factor, called, 'hypoxia-inducible', 'factor-', 1, 'α/β', '(', 'HIF-1α/β)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, hypoxic, stress, '(', 0.1, '%', 'O2)', decreased, the, expression, of, cytochrome, 'P450', 7, 'A1', '(', 'CYP7A1),', a, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, involved, in, bile, acid, biosynthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Chenodeoxycholic', acid, '(', 'CDCA),', a, major, component, of, bile, 'acids,']), verbo([represses]), complemento(['CYP7A1', by, activating, a, transcriptional, repressor, named, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', observed, that, hypoxia]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, levels, of, both, 'CDCA', and, 'SHP,', suggesting, that, hypoxia, repressed, 'CYP7A1', without, inducing, 'SHP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([finding]), complemento([that, overexpression, of, 'HIF-1α', increased, the, activity, of, the, 'CYP7A1', promoter, suggested, that, hypoxia, decreased, the, expression, of, 'CYP7A1', in, a, 'HIF-1-independent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', the, results, of, this, study]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, hypoxia, decreased, the, activity, of, 'CYP7A1', by, limiting, its, substrate, 'O2,', and, by, decreasing, the, transcription, of, 'CYP7A1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', acids, are, primarily]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([from, cholesterol, in, the, liver, and, have, important, roles, in, dietary, lipid, absorption, and, cholesterol, homoeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Detailed', roles, of, the, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, regulating, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1),', the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, in, bile, acid, 'synthesis,', have, not, yet, been, fully, elucidated])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'oestrogen-related', receptor, γ, '(', 'ERRγ)', is, a, novel, transcriptional, regulator, of, 'CYP7A1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Activation', of, cannabinoid, receptor, type, 1, '(', 'CB1', 'receptor)', signalling]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['ERRγ-mediated', transcription, of, the, 'CYP7A1', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'ERRγ']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['CYP7A1', expression, in, vitro, and, in, 'vivo,', whereas, knockdown, of, 'ERRγ', attenuated, 'CYP7A1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Small', heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, transcriptional, activity, of, 'ERRγ', and, thus, regulated, 'CYP7A1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'ERRγ']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, increased, bile, acid, 'levels,', whereas, an, inverse, agonist, of, 'ERRγ,', 'GSK5182,', reduced, 'CYP7A1', expression, and, bile, acid, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, molecular, mechanism, linking, 'ERRγ', and, bile, acid, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, observed, that, knockout, of, 'Niemann-Pick', 'C1-Like', 1, '(', 'NPC1L1),', a, cholesterol, transporter, essential, for, intestinal, cholesterol, 'absorption,', reduces, the, output, of, dry, stool, in, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Germ-free', '(', 'GF)', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([reduced, stool, output])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we, show, that, 'GF', versus, 'SPF', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([reduced, intestinal, absorption, and, increased, fecal, excretion, of, 'cholesterol,', particularly, after, treatment, with, ezetimibe])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', negative, balance, of, cholesterol, in, 'GF', mice, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, reduced, plasma, and, levels, of, other, genes, in, intestine, and, liver, largely, reflect, a, state, of, cholesterol, depletion, and, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, intestinal, sensing, of, bile, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['Altogether,', our, findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, broad, role, of, microbiota, in, regulating, 'whole-body', cholesterol, homeostasis, and, its, response, to, a, 'cholesterol-lowering', 'drug,', ezetimibe])]). relacion([sujeto(['Kaempferol', is, a, dietary, flavonol, previously, shown, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([cellular, lipid, and, glucose, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', its, molecular, mechanisms, of, action, and]), verbo([target]), complemento([proteins, have, remained, 'elusive,', probably, due, to, the, involvement, of, multiple, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study, investigated, the, molecular]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, kaempferol])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ligand']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, kaempferol, to, liver, 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXRs)', was, quantified, by, 'time-resolved', fluorescence, resonance, energy, transfer, and, surface, plasmon, resonance, analyses])]). relacion([sujeto(['Kaempferol', directly]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, and, induces, the, transactivation, of, 'LXRs,', with, stronger, specificity, for, the, 'β-subtype', '(', 'EC50', =, 0.33, 'μM)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', oral, administration, of, kaempferol, in, 'apolipoprotein-E-deficient', mice, '(', 150, 'mg/day/kg', body, 'weight)', significantly, reduced, plasma, glucose, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['high-density', lipoprotein, cholesterol, levels, and, insulin, sensitivity, compared, with, the, 'vehicle-fed', control])]). relacion([sujeto(['Kaempferol', also, reduced, plasma, triglyceride, concentrations, and, did, not]), verbo([cause]), complemento([liver, 'steatosis,', a, common, side, effect, of, potent, 'LXR', activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', immunoblotting, 'analysis,', kaempferol, reduced, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([accumulation, of, sterol, regulatory, 'element-binding', 'protein-1', '(', 'SREBP-1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['They', also]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, kaempferol, activates, 'LXR-β', and, suppresses, 'SREBP-1', to, enhance, symptoms, in, metabolic, syndrome])]). relacion([sujeto(['Consistent', with, disturbed, hepatic, clock, gene, expression, in, 'MLL4', mutant, 'mice,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, rhythmic, fluctuation, of, hepatic, and, serum, bile, acid, '(', 'BA)', levels, over, the, circadian, cycle, is, abolished, in, 'MLL4', mutant, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', our, results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([strong, in, vivo, support, for, important, roles, of, both, 'MLL3', and, 'MLL4', in, similar, metabolic, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', 'MLL3', and, 'MLL4', complexes]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, major, epigenetic, regulators, of, diverse, metabolic, processes, '(', including, circadian, control, of, bile, acid, 'homeostasis)', and, as, critical, transcriptional, coactivators, of, the, circadian, 'TFs,', 'RORs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Atorvastatin']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['BA', pool, 'size,', mainly, due, to, less, 'BA', in, the, intestine])]). relacion([sujeto(['Atorvastatin']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, ratio, of, 12, 'α-OH/non12α-OH', 'BAs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Atorvastatin']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, mRNAs, of, the, 'BA-synthetic', enzymes, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', '(', 'Cyp7a1)', '(', over, 10, -, 'fold)', and, cytochrome, 'P450', 27, 'a1,', the, 'BA', uptake, transporters, 'Na⁺/taurocholate', cotransporting, polypeptide, and, organic, anion, transporting, polypeptide, 1, 'b2,', and, the, efflux, transporter, multidrug, 'resistance-associated', protein, 2, in, the, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['Noticeably,', atorvastatin]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'BA', nuclear, receptor, farnesoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'FXR)', target, 'genes,', namely, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'liver)', and, fibroblast, growth, factor, 15, '(', 'ileum)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', atorvastatin]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, mRNAs, of, the, organic, cation, uptake, transporter, 1, and, cholesterol, efflux, transporters, 'Abcg5', and, 'Abcg8', in, the, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'BA-synthetic', enzymes, and, 'BA', transporters, appear, to, be, a, compensatory, response, to, maintain, 'BA', homeostasis, after, atorvastatin, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Cyp7a1', induction, by, atorvastatin, appears, to, be, due, to]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['FXR', signaling, in, both, the, liver, and, intestine])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bile', salts]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([their, own, production, by, inducing, the, nuclear, receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP)', '(', encoded, by, 'NR0B2),', which, contributes, to, repression, of, the, gene, encoding, cholesterol, 7, 'α-hydroxylase', '(', 'CYP7A1),', a, key, enzyme, for, the, control, of, bile, salt, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', bile, salts]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([hepatic, synthesis, of, nitric, oxide])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', investigated, the, role, of, nitric, oxide, signaling, in, 'the\240\control', of, 'CYP7A1', expression, and, the, involvement, in, 'this\240\process', of, 'glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate', dehydrogenase, '(', 'GAPDH),', which]), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, intracellular, propagation, of, nitric, oxide, signals])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rats', placed, on, 'cholate-rich', diets, and, given, 'L-NAME', had]), verbo([increased]), complemento([intrahepatic, and, biliary, levels, of, bile, 'salts,', and, deficiency, in, repression, of, 'CYP7A1', '(', at, the, messenger, 'RNA', and, protein, 'levels)', in, liver, 'tissue,', despite, preserved, induction, of, 'SHP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'hepatocytes,', cholate]), verbo([promoted]), complemento(['S-nitrosylation', of, 'GAPDH', and, its, translocation, to, the, 'nucleus,', accompanied, by, 'S-nitrosylation', of, histone, deacetylase, 2, '\240\(HDAC2)', and, 'Sirtuin', 1, '(', 'SIRT1),', deacetylases, that, 'participate,', 'respectively,', in, the, formation, of, 'Cyp7a1', and, 'Shp', repressor, complexes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'GAPDH']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([repression, of, 'CYP7A1', by, 'cholate,', and, blocking, nuclear, transport, of, nitrosylated, 'GAPDH', reduced, 'cholate-induced', nitrosylation, of, 'HDAC2', and, 'SIRT1;', this, effect, was, accompanied, by, abrogation, of, 'Cyp7a1', repression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cholate']), verbo([induced]), complemento([binding, of, 'SHP', to, 'HDAC2', and, its, recruitment, to, the, 'Cyp7a1', 'promoter;', these, processes, were, inhibited, by, blocking, nitric, oxide, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Levels', of, nitrosylated, 'GAPDH', and, nitrosylated, 'HDAC2', were]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, cholestatic, human, and, rat, livers, reflecting, increased, concentrations, of, bile, salts, in, these, conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', rat, 'liver,', excess, levels, of, bile, salts]), verbo([activate]), complemento([a, 'GAPDH-mediated', transnitrosylation, cascade, that, provides, feedback, inhibition, of, bile, salt, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Intestinal', 'L-cells', secrete, 'glucagon-like', 'peptide-1', '(', 'GLP-1)', and, can, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, bile, acids, '(', 'BA)', influencing, insulin, resistance, and, hepatic, steatosis, development, and, progression])]). accumulation, in, gallbladder, epithelial, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['They', also, affect, 'cross-talk', among, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptors, that, regulate, 'cholesterol-bile', acid, metabolism, in, the, nuclei, of, hepatocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', there, is, controversy, over, whether, or, how, statins, change, the, expression, of, an, antagonist, of, this, receptor])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, generally, assumed, that, the, antagonism]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, induction, of, cytochrome, 'P450', 7, 'A1', '(', verbo([targets]), complemento([aimed, to, ameliorating, atherosclerotic, 'lesions,', inducing, bile, acid, synthesis, to, eliminate, excess, cholesterol, in, body, is, an, effective, way])]). relacion([sujeto(['Individual', bile, acid, as, endogenous, ligands, for, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, has, differential, effects, on, regulating, bile, acid, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', total, plaque, areas, in, the, aortas, strongly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([2, -, fold, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')', in, 'TMAO', administration, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', levels, of, triglyceride, '(', 'TG),', total, cholesterol, '(', 'TC),', 'low-density', lipoprotein, cholesterol, '(', 'LDL-c)', in, 'TMAO', group, were, also, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, 25.5, '%', '(', 'P\240\=', 0.044, ')', ',', 31.2, '%', '(', 'P\240\=', 0.006, ')', ',', 28.3, '%', '(', 'P\240\=', 0.032, ')', ',', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mechanically,', 'TMAO']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([hepatic, bile, acid, synthesis, by, specifically, repressing, the, classical, bile, acid, synthesis, 'pathway,', which, complemento([that, 'TMAO', accelerated, aortic, lesion, formation, in, 'apoE-/-', mice, by, altering, bile, acid, 'profiles,', further, activating, nuclear, receptor, 'FXR', and, 'SHP', to, inhibit, bile, acid, synthesis, by, reducing, 'Cyp7a1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', body, weight]), verbo([gain]), complemento([and, visceral, adipose, tissue, weight, were, lower, in, the, 'collagen-fed', groups, than, in, the, control, group, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Plasma', and, hepatic, lipid, levels, were, significantly, reduced, by, downregulating, the, relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', 'MCFA']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'LXR', and, 'ABCG8,', enhanced, 'CYP7A1', and, 'CYP27A1', 'expression,', decreased, and, 'SHP', expression, in, the, 'liver,', thereby, promoted, liver, bile, acid, synthesis, and, excretion])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', addition, 'MCFA']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'ABCG5,', located, between, exons, -, 1, and, 1, ',']), verbo([causes]), complemento([the, inclusion, of, exon, 1, 'a;', the, second, causes, the, removal, of, exon, 2, ',', which, encodes, two, 'double-stranded', 'RNA-binding', 'domains;', and, the, 'third,', located, between, exons, 4, and, 6, ',', causes, the, inclusion, of, alternative, exon, 5, 'a,', introducing, a, 120, -, nucleotide, relacion([sujeto(['Agonist-activated', 'μ-opioid', receptor, '(', 'OPRM1)', undergoes, robust, receptor, phosphorylation, by, 'G', 'protein-coupled', receptor, kinases, and, subsequent, 'β-arrestin', 'TERT', protein, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, reduced, patient, survival])]). relacion([sujeto(['Identification', of, the, function, of, metal, ions, and, the, 'RNA', 'moieties,', particularly, 'nucleobases,', that]), verbo([bind]), complemento([metal, ions, is, important, in, 'RNA', catalysis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, combine, 'single-atom', and, abasic, differentially]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([proteome, of, a, meningococcal, hfq, deletion, mutant])]). relacion([sujeto(['From', 'these,', 81, were, identified, as, novel, 'Hfq-regulated', verbo([have]), complemento([expanded, the, repertoire, of, 'Hfq-regulated', proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', conjunction, with, previous, 'studies,', a, comprehensive, network, of, relacion([sujeto(['The', results, and, comparisons, with, other, 'gram-negative', model, 'systems,']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([still, unidentified, sRNA, analogs, in, 'N'])]). complemento([for, 'transport)', as, a, critical, complex, for, 'LINE', 'retrotransposition,', and, verified, that, this, interaction, is, conserved, for, human, 'L1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['ESCRT']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'L1', via, a, late, domain, 'motif,', and, this, interaction, facilitates, 'L1', replication])]). relacion([sujeto(['Loss', of, the, 'L1/ESCRT', interaction, complemento([gene, expression, 'post-transcriptionally'])]). relacion([sujeto(['N6-methyladenosine', '(', 'm6A)', is, the, most, prominent, mRNA, 'modification,', and, is, installed, by, a, large, with, 'A'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', our, findings]), verbo([have]), complemento([uncovered, distinct, features, of, a, mammalian, 'IP5', 2, -, 'K', and, set, the, stage, for, relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, crystal, structures, of, 'GRSF1', orthologs]), verbo([have]), complemento([not, been, 'solved,', amino, acid, alignments, with, similar, 'RNA-binding', proteins, complemento([that, synthetic, 'MBNL', proteins, with, improved, or, altered, splicing, activity, have, the, potential, to, be, used, as, both, tools, for, investigating, splicing, regulation, and, protein, therapeutics, for, 'DM', and, other, microsatellite, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Guanine-rich', 'RNA', sequence]), verbo([binding]), complemento([factor, 1, '(', 'GRSF1)', is, a, member, of, the, heterogeneous, nuclear, ribonucleoprotein, 'F/H', family, and, has, been, implicated, in, 'RNA', 'processing,', 'RNA', transport, and, translational, regulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Amino', acid, alignments, and, homology, modeling]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([the, existence, of, three, distinct, 'RNA-binding', domains, and, two, auxiliary, domains])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', explore, the, 'RNA-binding', mechanisms, we, first]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['full-length', human, 'GRSF1', and, several, truncation, 'mutants,', which, include, the, three, separated, qRRM, domains, in, 'E'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', expression, levels, varied, between, 1, and, 10, mg, purified, protein, per, 'L', bacterial, liquid, culture, and, for, 'full-length', human, 'GRSF1', a]), verbo([binding]), complemento([constant, '(', 'KD-value)', of, 0.5, μM, was, determined])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', our, mechanistic, experiments, with, different, truncation, mutants, allowed, the, following, 'conclusions:', 'i)', 'Deletion', of, either, of, the, three, 'RNA-binding', domains, impaired, the, 'RNA-binding', affinity]), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, simultaneous, presence, of, the, three, domains, is, essential, for, 'high-affinity', 'RNA-binding'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', this, structural, subunit, may, not, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'RNA', interaction])]). relacion([sujeto(['iii)', 'Deletion', of, the, acidic, auxiliary, domain, improved, the, 'RNA-binding']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, regulatory, role, for, this, structural, motif])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', together, these, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, cooperative, interaction, of, the, three, qRRMs, is, required, for, high, affinity, 'RNA-binding'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Based', on, 'cross-linking-coupled', mass, 'spectrometry,', crystal, structure, of, the, 'CPSF160-WDR33', subcomplex, and, biochemical, 'assays,', we, define, the, molecular, architecture, of, the, core, human, 'CPSF', 'complex,', identifying, specific, domains]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'inter-subunit', interactions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', these, results, shed, light, on, the, function, of, 'CPSF', in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento(['PAS-dependent', 'RNA', cleavage, and, polyadenylation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interferon-induced', transmembrane, proteins, '(', 'IFITMs)', are, restriction, factors, that]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, 'post-translational', modifications, of, 'SG', components])]). relacion([sujeto(['G3BP1', methylation]), verbo([represses]), complemento(['SG', formation, and, is, reversible])]). monomethylation, and, asymmetric, dimethylation, at, three, 'Arg', residues])]). relacion([sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'JMJD6']), verbo([repressed]), complemento(['SG', formation, and, 'G3BP1', 'demethylation,', but, 'SG', formation, and, 'G3BP1', demethylation, were, rescued, with, catalytically, active, but, not, mutant, 'JMJD6'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'JMJD6', functions, directly, or, indirectly, as, an, arginine, demethylase, of, 'G3BP1', that, promotes, 'SG', formation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Endosomal', recycling, of, the, 5, '\'', -, end, of, tRNA])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([previously, that, 'RNase', 'P', in, the, hyperthermophilic, archaeon, 'Pyrococcus', horikoshii, 'OT3', pairing])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', bulge, most, likely]), verbo([provides]), complemento([the, flexibility, needed, to, allow, optimal, stacking, between, the, methyl, group, and, 3, '\'', neighbor, through, a, conformation, that, is, stabilized, by, 'Mg2+'])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', m6A, embedded, in, duplex, 'RNA', is, poorly]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([by, the, 'YTH', elements, of, the, transcription, 'machinery,', termination, factor, condensation, is, functionally, important])]). relacion([sujeto(['Stress-induced', misfolding, and, intraneuronal, aggregation, of, the, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([nucleic, acid, binding, protein, 'TDP-43', '(', transactive, response, 'DNA', binding, protein, 43, 'kDa)', and, its, fragments, have, been, implicated, 'native-like', secondary, structure])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'A', form, is, metastable, and, swiftly, aggregates, into, a, highly, stable, 'amyloid-like', protofibrillar, form, '(', β, 'form)']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, 'disorder-to-order', transition, of, intrinsically, disordered, regions, upon, small, environmental, perturbations])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', verbo([reported]), complemento([of, having, interstitial, disease, by, various, imaging, modalities])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', can]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, respiratory, insufficiency, and, complemento([the, lysosomal, cholesterol, transporter, 'NPC1,', the, sterol, gets, unequally, distributed, across, intracellular, compartments])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', using, pharmacological, and,
