the, 'ER', but, not, the, 'PM'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', this, study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento(['ER', sterol, levels, as, a, metabolic, rheostat, for, the, activation, of, the, 'NLRP3', inflammasome])]). relacion([sujeto(['Transport', begins, when, cholesterol]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'N-terminal', domain, '(', 'NTD)', of, 'NPC1,', which, projects, to, the, surface, of, the, glycocalyx])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, reconstitute, cholesterol, transport, by]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([the, 'NTD', as, a, fragment, separate, from, the, remaining, portion, of, 'NPC1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', 'co-expressed,', the, two, 'NPC1', fragments, reconstitute, cholesterol, 'transport,', indicating, that, the, 'NTD']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, flexibility, to, interact, with, the, remaining, parts, of, 'NPC1', even, when, not, covalently, linked])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', disease, type, 'C', '(', 'NPC)', is, a, neurovisceral, disorder]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, accumulation, of, lipids, such, as, cholesterol, and, sphingolipids])]). relacion([sujeto(['NPC', is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, either, 'NPC1', or, 'NPC2,', which, encode, lysosomal, proteins, located, at, membraneous, and, soluble, 'fractions,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', the, past, 'decade,', the, oxidation, products, of, 'cholesterol,', such, as, 'cholestane-3β,5α,6β-triol', and, 7, -, 'ketocholesterol,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, considered, selective, biomarkers, for, 'NPC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', recent, evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([indicated, numerous, novel, biomarkers, for, 'NPC,', which, raises, the, possibility, that, the, diagnosis, of, 'NPC', might, be, associated, with, the, elevation, of, multiple, lipid, 'biomarkers,', rather, than, a, single, biomarker])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sphingosylphosphorylcholine', '(', 'SPC)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, to, be, one, such, biomarker, for, 'NPC,', in, which, elevated, sphingomyelin, is, a, potential, precursor])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', further, extended, the, study, to, plasma, 'lysophingomyelin-509', for, 'NPC,', a, newly]), verbo([reported]), complemento([biomarker, with, uncharacterized, chemical, nature])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, efficacy, of, plasma, 'SPC', and, 'lysosphingomyelin-509', as, promising, biomarkers, for, this, disorder, was, supported, by, the]), verbo([finding]), complemento([that, the, urinary, concentration, of, 3, 'β-sulfooxy-7β-N-acetylglucosaminyl-5-cholen-24-oic', 'acid,', an, established, biomarker, for, 'NPC,', was, also, elevated, in, the, 'NPC-affected', individuals])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, novel, combination, of, plasma, 'biomarkers,', such, as, 'SPC', 'and/or', 'lysophingomyelin-509,', and, urinary, bile, acid, metabolite, could, offer, a, promising, platform, for, the, diagnosis, of, 'NPC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', 'C1', '(', 'NPC1),', a, host, receptor]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, envelope, glycoprotein, '(', 'GP)-mediated', entry, of, filoviruses, into, 'cells,', is, believed, to, be, a, major, determinant, of, cell, susceptibility, to, filovirus, infection])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, known, that, proteolytically, digested, 'Ebola', virus, '(', 'EBOV)', 'GP']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 2, protruding, loops, in, domain, 'C', of, 'NPC1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', investigate, whether, these, 'SNPs', affect, cell, susceptibility, to, filovirus, 'infection,', we, generated, 'Vero', 'E6', cell, lines, stably]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['NPC1', with, 'SNP', substitutions, and, compared, their, susceptibility, to, vesicular, stomatitis, virus, pseudotyped, with, filovirus, 'GPs', and, infectious, 'EBOV'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, some, of, the, substitutions, resulted, in, reduced, susceptibility, to, 'filoviruses,', as, indicated, by, the, lower, titers, and, smaller, 'plaque/focus', sizes, of, the, viruses])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, human, 'NPC1', 'SNPs', may, likely, affect, host, susceptibility, to, filoviruses])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whereas', deficient, 'HH', signalling]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, birth, 'defects,', unrestrained, 'HH', signalling, is, implicated, in, human, 'cancers2,4-6'])]). relacion([sujeto(['N-terminally', palmitoylated, 'HH']), verbo([releases]), complemento([the, repression, of, 'Patched', to, the, oncoprotein, smoothened, '(', 'SMO);', 'however,', the, mechanism, by, which, 'HH', recognizes, 'Patched', is, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento(['cryo-electron', microscopy, structures, of, human, patched, 1, '(', 'PTCH1)', alone, and, in, complex, with, the, 'N-terminal', domain, of, '\'', 'native\'', sonic, hedgehog, '(', native, 'SHH-N', has, both, a, 'C-terminal', cholesterol, and, an, 'N-terminal', 'fatty-acid', 'modification),', at, resolutions, of, 3.5, '\240\Å', and, 3.8, '\240\Å,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', structure, of, 'PTCH1']), verbo([has]), complemento([internal, 'two-fold', pseudosymmetry, in, the, transmembrane, 'core,', which, features, a, 'sterol-sensing', domain, and, two, homologous, extracellular, 'domains,', resembling, the, architecture, of, 'Niemann-Pick', 'C1', '(', 'NPC1)', protein7])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', palmitoylated, 'N', terminus, of, 'SHH-N', inserts, into, a, cavity, between, the, extracellular, domains, of, 'PTCH1', and, dominates, the, 'PTCH1-SHH-N', 'interface,', which, is, distinct, from, that]), verbo([reported]), complemento([for, 'SHH-N', 'co-receptors8'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', biochemical, assays, show, that, 'SHH-N', may, use, another, 'interface,', one, that, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, its, 'co-receptor', 'binding,', to, recruit, 'PTCH1', in, the, absence, of, a, covalently, attached, palmitate])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', work]), verbo([provides]), complemento([atomic, insights, into, the, recognition, of, the, 'N-terminal', domain, of, 'HH', '(', 'HH-N)', by, 'PTCH1,', offers, a, structural, basis, for, cooperative, binding, of, 'HH-N', to, various, receptors, and, serves, as, a, molecular, framework, for, 'HH', signalling, and, its, malfunction, in, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, reported, an, enhanced, processing, of, 'β-amyloid', precursor, protein, '(', 'APP)', by, 'β-secretase', '(', 'BACE1),', a, key, all, three, substrates, was, detected, in, 'NPC1', vs])]). relacion([sujeto(['wt-mouse', brains, at, 4, -, weeks, of, 'age,', at, 10, -, weeks]), verbo([increased]), complemento([proteolysis, by, complemento([to, be, expressed, in, 'Purkinje', neurons, and, their, immunostaining, was, lost, upon, 'Purkinje', cell, neurodegeneration, in, 10, -, weeks, old, 'NPC1', mice])]). mutation, of, 'Npc1', or, 'Npc2', 'gene,', resulting, in, various, progressive, pathological, features])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, showed, that, the, expression, of, myelin, mouse, brain])]). relacion([sujeto(['NP-C', is, transmitted, in, an, autosomal, recessive, manner, and, is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, either, the, 'NPC1', '(', 95, '%', of, 'families)', or, 'NPC2', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Variants', of, adenosine, triphosphatase, '(', 'ATPase)', subunit, 6, and, 'ATPase', subunit, 8, '(', 'ATPase6/8)', in, mitochondrial, 'DNA', '(', to, storage, of, cholesterol, and, sphingosine])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, commonly, assumed, that, neuroinflammation, is, the, result, of, infiltration, of, 'monocyte-derived', macrophages, integral, transmembrane, protein, localized, to, the, limiting, membrane, of, the, lysosome])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', is, no, cure, for, 'NP-C', but, there, is, a, 'disease-modifying', drug, complemento([or, ameliorate, 'neurodegeneration,', reduce, biochemical, pathology, and, normalize, or, improve, various, indices, of, motor, function])]). relacion([sujeto(['Over-expression', of, human, 'NPC1', does, not]), verbo([cause]), complemento([adverse, effects, in, the, brain, and, correctly, localizes, to, late, 'endosomal/lysosomal', compartments])]). relacion([sujeto(['Even', at, a, low, 'dose,', gene, therapy]), verbo([has]), complemento([all, the, benefits, of, miglustat, but, without, adverse, effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', disease, type, 'C', '(', 'NP-C)', of, motor, control, and, seizures])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, show, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([of, the, spontaneous, electrical, activity, in, 'NPC1-/-', neuronal, network, when, 1, :, 100, ',', 0, and, the, rarity, of, the, disease, translate, into, 'misdiagnosis,', delayed, diagnosis, and, barriers, to, good, care])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', these, 'reasons,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, clinical, guidelines, that, define, standard, of, care, for, 'NPC', 'patients,', foster, shared, care, arrangements, between, expert, centres, and, family, lacks, effective, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['Five', selected, hits]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['BSL-4', 'live-EBOV', infection, in, a, 'dose-dependent', 'manner,', including, vindesine, '(', 0.34, 'μM)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Compounds', identified, in, this, study, are, among, the, most, potent, and, 'well-characterized', 'anti-EBOV', inhibitors]), verbo([reported]), complemento([to, date])]). relacion([sujeto(['NPC1', is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'neuroinflammation;', 'however,', attempts, to, therapeutically, target, neuroinflammation, in, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Histopathologically,', the, liver, presents, with, large, numbers, of, foam, 'cells;', 'however,', their, role, in, disease, pathogenesis]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, explored, in, depth])]). relacion([sujeto(['GdCl₃', treatment, successfully, blocked, the, endocytic, capacity, of, hepatic, 'Kupffer/foam', measured, by, 'India', ink, 'endocytosis,']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, levels, 'CD68-A', marker, of, 'Kupffer', cells, in, the, 'liver-and', normalized, the, transaminase, levels, in, serum, of, 'NPC', mice, to, a, signaling, 'pathway,', potentially, driven, by, the, 'T/T', genotype])]). relacion([sujeto(['Other', genes, significantly, 'dysregulated,', and, not]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'MAPK', relacion([sujeto(['DNase', 'I', 'footprinting,', gel, shift, 'assays,', and, chromatin, immunoprecipitation, assays, demonstrated, that, 'SREBP-1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([directly, to, the, overexpression, of, 'SREBP-1c/ADD-1']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['SHP', mRNA, expression, and, repressed, 'CYP7A1', expression, in, 'HepG2', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, a, 'four-nucleotide', deletion, '(', -, 195, 'CT-GAdel)', in, the, hSHP, 'promoter,', which, is, reported, to, be, associated, with, altered, body, weight, and, of, the, hSHP, 'promoter,', because, of, the, reduced, binding, of, 'SREBP-1', to, the, mutated, 'SRE1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Small', heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP;', 'NR0B2)', is, an, atypical, orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, lacks, a, conventional, 'DNA', binding, domain, '(', 'DBD)', and, represses, the, transcriptional, activity, of, various, nuclear, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro, and, in, vivo, protein, interaction, studies, showed, that, 'SHP', physically]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'BETA2/NeuroD,', but, not, its, heterodimer, partner, 'E47'])]). relacion([sujeto(['SHP']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['BETA2/NeuroD-dependent', transactivation, of, an, 'E-box', 'reporter,', whereas, 'SHP', was, unable, to, repress, the, 'E47-mediated', transactivation, and, the, 'E-box', mutant, reporter, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'SHP']), verbo([repressed]), complemento([the, 'BETA2-dependent', activity, of, glucokinase, and, 'cyclin-dependent', kinase, inhibitor, p21, gene, promoters])]). relacion([sujeto(['Gel', shift, and, in, vitro, protein, competition, assays, indicated, that, 'SHP']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([neither, dimerization, nor, 'DNA', binding, of, 'BETA2', and, 'E47'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rather,', 'SHP', directly]), verbo([repressed]), complemento(['BETA2', transcriptional, activity, and, 'p300-enhanced', 'BETA2/NeuroD', transcriptional, activity, by, inhibiting, interaction, between, 'BETA2', and, coactivator, p300])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, showed, that, 'C-terminal', repression, domain, within, 'SHP', is, also]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'BETA2', repression])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', inhibition, of, 'BETA2', activity, was, not, observed, by, naturally, occurring, human, 'SHP', mutants, that, cannot]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'BETA2/NeuroD'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SHP', acts, as, a, novel, corepressor, for, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', transcription, factor, 'BETA2/NeuroD', by, competing, with, coactivator, p300, for, binding, to, 'BETA2/NeuroD', and, by, its, direct, transcriptional, repression, function])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', orphan]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP;', 'NR0B2)', is, an, unusual, orphan, nuclear, receptor, that, lacks, a, conventional, 'DNA-binding', domain, and, acts, as, a, modulator, of, transcriptional, activities, of, a, number, of, nuclear, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, reported, that, the, orphan, nuclear, receptor, 'ERRgamma', activates, the, 'SHP', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([found, that, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', '(', 'bHLH)', transcription, 'factors,', the, 'E2A', proteins, '(', 'E47,', 'E12', and, 'E2/5),', activated, the, human, but, not, the, mouse, 'SHP', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, 'tissue-specific', 'E47', heterodimer, partner, 'BETA2']), verbo([repressed]), complemento([the, 'E47-', mediated, transactivation, of, the, human, 'SHP', '(', 'hSHP)', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', serial, deletions, and, 'E-box', mutant, 'breast-cancer', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', orphan, receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP,', 'NR0B2)']), verbo([modulates]), complemento([the, transcription, activity, of, the, 'MODY1', gene, 'HNF4a'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, 'SHP', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 7, '%', of, 'Japanese', obese, 'young-onset', type, 2, diabetic, patients, and, were, associated, with, moderate, obesity, and, increased, birth, weight])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', polymorphism, was, not]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, diabetes, in, case, control, or, familial, association, studies])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'A', allele, '(', frequency, 0.07, ')', was, not]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, obesity, in, type, 2, diabetic, subjects, '(', n, =, 348, ')', ',', their, parents, '(', n, =, 272, ')', ',', or, young, nondiabetic, adults, '(', n, =, 925, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, genetic, variation, in, 'SHP', is, unlikely, to, be, common, in, the, predisposition, to, 'diabetes,', 'obesity,', or, increased, birth, weight, in, 'U'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', small, heterodimer, partner, 'SHP', '(', 'NR0B2)', is, an, unusual]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, that, lacks, the, typical, 'DNA', binding, domain, common, to, most, nuclear, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['SHP']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, act, as, a, corepressor, for, several, nuclear, 'receptors,', but, its, exact, mechanism, of, action, is, still, elusive])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'SHP', can]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, liver, 'X', receptors, 'LXRalpha', '(', 'NR1H3)', and, 'LXRbeta', '(', 'NR1H2),', as, demonstrated, receptor, and, subsequently, induce, 'SHP,', leads, to, the, repression, of, the, human, 'ABCG1', 'gene,', an, established, 'LXR', target, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, complemento([receptor, small, heterodimer, partner, '(', 'SHP;', 'NR0B2)', interacts, with, a, wide, array, of, nuclear, receptors, and, represses, their, transcriptional, activity])]). 'receptor-related', receptor, gamma, '(', 'ERRgamma)', but, not, the, related, 'ERRalpha', and, 'ERRbeta', isoforms])]). relacion([sujeto(['ERRgamma', transactivation, is, dependent, on, only, one, verbo([caused]), complemento([renal, failure, in, old, 'mice,', not, in, young, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', injection, of, low, dose, resulted, in, severe, renal, damage, in, old, complemento([widespread, derepression, of, 'wild-type', 'miR-140-5p', targets, and, repression, of, mutant, 'miR-140-5p', 'targets,', indicating, that, the, mutation, produces, both, protein, 'Ybx1', for, overlapping, binding, sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([finding]), complemento([may, explain, the, potent, target, repression, and, robust, in, vivo, effect, by, this, mutant, miRNA, even, in, the, absence, of, evolutionary, selection, of, 'miRNA-target', 'RNA', 'interactions,', which, contributes, to, the, strong, regulatory, effects, of, conserved, 'miRNAs7,8'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', study, presents, the, first, case, of, a, pathogenic, 'gain-of-function', miRNA, mutation, and]), verbo([provides]), complemento([molecular, insight, into, neomorphic, actions, of, emerging, 'and/or', mutant, miRNAs])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', research]), verbo([has]), complemento([observed, that, 'β-asarone', effectively, attenuated, symptoms, 'Gag,']), verbo([found]), complemento([in, all, 'retroviruses,', is, a, polyprotein, comprising, three, major, functional, 'domains:', matrix, '(', 'MA),', capsid, '(', 'CA),', and, nucleocapsid, '(', 'NC)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, both, mature, 'BLV', 'MA', and, 'NC', are, able, to, bind, to, nucleic, 'acids;', 'however,', the, viral, 'BLV', 'Gag']), verbo([has]), complemento([an, elongated, 'rod-shaped', structure, that, is, relatively, 'rigid,', with, the, exception, of, the, linker, between, the, 'MA', and, 'CA', domains])]). relacion([sujeto(['Deletion', of, the, 'MA', domain]), verbo([maintains]), complemento([the, elongated, structure, but, alters, the, rate, of, 'BLV', 'Gag-facilitated', annealing, of, two, verbo([has]), complemento([yet, to, be, elucidated, at, high, resolution])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([structural, data, for, 'BLV', 'Gag', and, could, be, a, starting, point, for, modeling, 'Gag-small', molecule, interactions, with, the, ultimate, goal, of, developing, of, a, new, class, of, pharmaceuticals])]). relacion([sujeto([cruzi, trypomastigotes, '(', 'Ty),', the, classical, infective, 'stage,']), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, extracellular, matrix, '(', 'ECM),', an, obligatory, step, before, invasion, of, almost, all, mammalian, cells, in, different, tissues])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([characterized, the, proteome, and, phosphoproteome, of, 'T'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Proteins']), verbo([involved]), complemento([with, metabolic, processes, '(', such, as, the, glycolytic, 'pathway),', 'kinases,', flagellum, and, microtubule, related, 'proteins,', 'transport-associated', proteins, and, 'RNA/DNA', binding, elements, are, highly, represented, in, the, pool, of, proteins, modified, by, phosphorylation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further,', important, metabolic, switches]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, this, interaction, with, 'ECM', were, indicated, by, decreases, in, the, phosphorylation, of, 'hexokinase,', 'phosphofructokinase,', 'fructose-2,6-bisphosphatase,', 'phosphoglucomutase,', phosphoglycerate, kinase, in, 'MTy'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Concomitantly,', a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, pyruvate, and, lactate, and, an, increase, of, glucose, and, succinate, contents, were, detected, by, 'GC-MS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', observations]), verbo([led]), complemento([us, to, focus, on, the, changes, in, the, glycolytic, pathway, upon, binding, of, the, parasite, to, the, 'ECM'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Putative', kinases]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, protein, phosphorylation, to, cell, invasion, and, differentiation, into, 'amastigotes,', the, multiplicative, intracellular, stage, of, 'T'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Local', translation, in, neurites, is, a, phenomenon, that]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([the, spatial, segregation, of, proteins, and, their, functions, away, from, the, cell, 'body,', yet, it, is, unclear, how, local, translation, varies, across, neuronal, cell, types])]). relacion([sujeto(['Most', of, the, mRNAs, discovered, as, being, locally]), verbo([translated]), complemento([have, been, identified, from, hippocampal, neurons, because, their, laminar, organization, facilitates, 'neurite-specific', dissection, and, microscopy, methods])]). relacion([sujeto(['Given', the, diversity, of, neurons, across, the, 'brain,', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([not, yet, analyzed, how, locally, translated, mRNAs, differ, across, cell, types])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, impact, early, and, late, onset, effects, of, irradiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Saturated', fatty, acid, '(', 'SFA)-induced', lipotoxicity, is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, the, accumulation, 'significantly,', does, not, require, catalytically, active, viperin])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', conclude, that, the, synergistic, activation, of, viperin, and, 'IRAK1']), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, mechanism, that, couples, innate, immune, signaling, with, the, production, of, the, antiviral, nucleotide, ddhCTP])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, m6A, modifications, are]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'H/R-treated', cardiomyocytes, and, 'ischemia/reperfusion', '(', 'I/R)-treated', mice, heart])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([the, association, of, the, 'RNA-binding', protein, 'HNRNPD', with, 'TFEB', 'pre-mRNA', and, subsequently, decreases, the, expression, levels, of, 'TFEB'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further', experiments, show, that, autophagic, flux]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, 'METTL3', deficiency, is, 'TFEB', dependent])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'turn,', 'TFEB']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, levels, of, 'METTL3', and, 'ALKBH5', in, opposite, 'directions:', it, induces, 'ALKBH5', and, inhibits, 'METTL3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['TFEB']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'ALKBH5', promoter, and, activates, its, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', inhibition, of, 'METTL3', by, 'TFEB', does, not]), verbo([involve]), complemento([transcriptional, repression, but, rather, downregulation, of, mRNA, 'stability,', thereby, establishing, a, negative, feedback, loop])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', our, work, proteins, '(', 'HPs)', in, yeast, and, planta, 'cells,', suggesting, a, possible, participation, of, the, 'two-component', signalling, systems, '(', 'TCS)', in, rice, meiosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', proposed, method, was, successfully, applied, to, quantify, 'EPT', in, bulk, powder, and, in, pharmaceutical, formulation, with, a, runtime, shorter, than, all, the]), verbo([reported]), complemento([methods])]). relacion([sujeto(['They', are, extremely, diverse, and, include, noncoding, 'RNAs', '(', 'sRNA),', antisense, 'RNAs,', and, some, 5, '\'', or, 3, '\'', complemento([been, summarized])]). relacion([sujeto(['Based', on, the, subunit, 'size,', the, purified, peroxidase, was, a, 40, ' kDa', monomeric, structure, and, presented, high, 'thermostability,', as, it, was, entirely, stable, at, 55, ' °C', for, 30, ' min', and]), verbo([retained]), complemento([approximately, 13.6, '%', of, its, activity, at, 85, ' °C'])]). relacion([sujeto(['To']), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, enzyme, 'durability,', efficiency, and, 'reusability,', the, peroxidase, was, entrapped, onto, a, carboxymethyl, 'cellulose/Fe3O4', magnetic, hybrid, material])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', immobilized, enzyme]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([its, activity, upon, storage, at, 4, and, 25, ' °C', for, 8, ' weeks,', and, upon, recycling, for, up, to, 15, uses])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', specialized, cell, types, such, as, 'neurons,', microtubules]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([the, integrity, of, axons, by, forming, stable, bundles, and, facilitate, the, transport, of, synaptic, vesicles])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', cells]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, stability, and, dynamics, of, microtubules, using, a, diverse, array, of, mechanisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', of, the, mechanisms]), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, interaction, of, microtubules, with, its, associated, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Microtubule-associated', proteins, '(', 'MAPs)', may]), verbo([have]), complemento([either, stabilizing, or, destabilizing, effects, on, the, microtubules])]). relacion([sujeto(['Tau,', a, neuronal, 'MAP,']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([the, assembly, and, bundling, of, microtubules, and, suppresses, microtubule, dynamics])]). relacion([sujeto(['Abnormal', functioning, of, tau, is, implicated, in, several, neuronal, disorders, such, as, 'Alzheimer\'s', disease, '(', 'AD)', and, 'Parkinson\'s', disease, '(', 'PD),', wherein, tau, forms, insoluble, aggregates, and]), verbo([causes]), complemento([neurotoxicity])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, discuss, the, factors, that]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, tau, aggregation, and, the, resulting, destabilization, of, microtubules, and, the, implications, of, this, phenomenon, in, the, 'AD', and, other, tauopathies])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', emulsions, stabilized, by, 'WP', and, 'WP/GA', mixtures]), verbo([have]), complemento([encapsulation, efficiencies, of, &, 'gt;50%', for, 'resveratrol,', while, emulsions, showed, the, best, stability, at, a, 'GA', concentration, of, 0.2, '%'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, 'GA', could, effectively, improve, the, emulsifying, capacity, of, 'WP,', while, the, emulsions, prepared, by, 'WP/GA', mixtures]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, potential, to, serve, as, carriers, for, bioactive, components])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, study, we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, 'design,', construction, and, validation, of, a, novel, transposon, aimed, to, systematically, screen, for, protein, localization, and, expression, patterns, in, prokaryotes, using, fluorescence, microscopy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Importantly,', upon, flipping, out, the, 'PLtetO-1', promoter, and, neighboring, antibiotic, resistance, 'marker,', an, 'in-frame', '"', 'sandwich"', msfGFP, fusion, is, created, in, which, the, 'N-', and, 'C-terminal', portions, of, the]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([protein, are, again, controlled, by, its, native, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overactivity', of, 'hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal', '(', 'HPA)', axis, function]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, depression, and, suicidal, behavior])]). in, different, areas, of, the, postmortem, brain, of, suicide, 'subjects,', i])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, mRNA, levels, of, 'CRF', were, significantly, studied])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', we, compared, the, protein, expression, of, 'CRF', components, we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'CRF', was, significantly, increased, and, 'CRF-R1,', internal, sarcoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'SR)', calcium, store])]). relacion([sujeto(['Its', importance, is, highlighted, by, perinatal, death, if, any, one, of, the, 'EC-coupling', components, are, 'calsequestrin,']), verbo([associated]), complemento([mainly, with, 'SR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', 'SR', proteins, are, not, essential, for, survival, but, exert, structural, and, functional, influences, that, modify, the]), verbo([gain]), complemento([of, 'EC-coupling', and, maintain, normal, muscle, function])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', highlight, significant, areas, that]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, continuing, challenge, for, the, field])]). relacion([sujeto(['Additional', important, components, of, the, 'Ca2+']), verbo([release]), complemento(['complex,', such, as, 'FKBP12,', 'calmodulin,', 'S100A1', and, 'Stac3', are, identified, and, reviewed, elsewhere])]). relacion([sujeto(['Skeletal', muscle, mass, and, power]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([with, 'age,', leading, to, impairment, of, mobility, and, metabolism, in, the, elderly])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ca2+', 'channels,', such, as, dihydropyridine, receptor, '(', 'DHPR),', 'two-pore', channel, '(', 'TPC)', and, inositol, 1, ',', 4, ',', 5, -, triphosphate, receptor, '(', 'ITPR),', function, to]), verbo([maintain]), complemento(['Ca2+', homeostasis, in, myoblasts])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, observed, a, significant]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, expression, of, type, 1, 'IP3', receptor, '(', 'ITPR1),', but, not, types, 2, and, 3, ',', in, aged, mice, skeletal, muscle, and, isolated, 'myoblasts,', compared, with, those, of, young, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['ITPR1', knockdown, using, 'shRNA-expressing', viruses, in, 'C2C12', myoblasts, and, relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, 'CAPN3']), verbo([cause]), complemento([limb, girdle, muscular, dystrophy, type, 2, 'A', '(', 'LGMD2A),', a, progressive, muscle, wasting, disease])]). 'C3KO', fibers])]). relacion([sujeto(['Confocal', studies, confirmed, that, 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([release]), complemento([was, similarly, reduced, in, all, triads, of, 'C3KO', mice])]). 'coupling,', the, rapid, and, massive, 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([release]), complemento([under, control, of, an, action, potential, that, triggers, muscle, 'contraction,', takes, places, at, specialized, regions, of, the, cell, called, triad, junctions])]). relacion([sujeto(['There,', a, highly, ordered, supramolecular, complex, between, the, dihydropyridine, receptor, '(', 'DHPR)', and, the, ryanodine, receptor, '(', 'RyR1)']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([the, 'quasi-instantaneous', conversion, from, 'T-tubule', depolarization, into, 'Ca(2+)', release, from, the, sarcoplasmic, 'D', structure, of, the, 'DHPR', as, obtained, by, transmission, electron, microscopy, and, image, reconstruction])]). relacion([sujeto([1, and, 'RyR1', as, voltage, sensor, and, 'SR', 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([release]), complemento(['channel,', 'respectively,', have, been, established, for, nearly, 25, 'years,', the, mechanism, underlying, communication, between, these, two, channels, remains, undefined])]). relacion([sujeto(['Schwann', cells, are, integral, components, of, vertebrate, neuromuscular, 'synapses;', in, their, 'absence,', 'pre-synaptic', nerve, terminals, withdraw, from, 'Schwann', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, muscle, denervation, and, neuromuscular, synapse, loss, were, prevented, in, 'CRD-Nrg1-/-mice', when, presynaptic, activity, was, blocked, by, ablating, a, specific, 'gene,', such, as, 'Snap25', '(', 'synaptosomal-associated', 25, kDa, 'protein)', or, 'Chat', '(', choline, 'acetyltransferase)'])]). complemento([robust, synaptic, activity, in, the, 'rescued,', 'Schwann-cell', deficient, 'NMJs', in, 'CRD-Nrg1-/-Cacnb1-/-or', 'CRD-Nrg1-/-Ryr1-/-mutant', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Instead,', a, relacion([sujeto(['AF', inducibility, was, markedly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([after, 'QL', treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'AERP', 'cardiotoxicity,', as, it, can]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['life-threatening', ventricular, arrhythmias])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sweroside']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, 'aconitine-induced', mRNA, expressions, of, 'NaV1'])]). relacion([sujeto([5, '(', encoded, by, 'SCN5A),', 'RyR2', and, 'DHPR,', and, reversed, the, 'aconitine-induced']), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, mRNA, level, of, 'SERCA,', thus, preventing, the, 'aconitine-induced', persistent, intracellular, 'Ca2+', accumulation, and, avoiding, intracellular, 'Ca2+', overload])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', further]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, sweroside, restabilized, the, 'aconitine-disrupted', mitochondrial, membrane, potential, '(', 'ΔΨ)', and, reversed, the, through, a, physical, interaction, between, the, dihydropyridine, receptor, '(', 'DHPR),']), verbo([acting]), complemento([as, a, voltage, 'sensor,', and, the, ryanodine, receptor, '(', 'RyR1),', acting, as, a, calcium, release, channel])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', the, adaptor, protein, 'SH3', and, 'cysteine-rich', containing, protein, 3, '(', 'STAC3)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, a, myopathy, disease, gene, and, as, an, additional, essential, 'EC', coupling, component])]). relacion([sujeto(['STAC3']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'DHPR', sequences, including, the, critical, 'EC', coupling, domain, and, has, been, proposed, to, function, in, linking, the, 'DHPR', and, 'RyR1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, 'contrary,', 'here,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, endogenous, 'STAC3', incorporates, into, triads, in, the, absence, of, the, 'DHPR', in, myotubes, and, muscle, fibers, of, dysgenic, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([finding]), complemento([demonstrates, that, 'STAC3', interacts, with, additional, triad, proteins, and, is, consistent, with, its, proposed, role, in, directly, or, indirectly, linking, the, 'DHPR', with, the, 'RyR1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', understanding, of, 'ECC']), verbo([has]), complemento([increased, enormously, since, the, early, scientific, descriptions, of, the, phenomenon, of, electrical, activation, of, muscle, contraction, by, 'Galvani', that, date, back, to, the, end, of, the, eighteenth, century])]). relacion([sujeto(['Major', advances, in, electrical, and, optical, 'measurements,', including, muscle, fiber, voltage, clamp, to]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([membrane, electrical, 'properties,', in, conjunction, with, the, development, of, electron, microscopy, to, unveil, structural, details, provided, an, elegant, view, of, 'ECC', in, skeletal, muscle, during, the, last, century])]). of, tumour, cells, with, or, without, intracytoplasmic, 'lipid,', with, the, latter, being, more, proliferative, and, associated, with, spontaneous, 'Myc', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['AKT/HRAS-induced', tumorigenesis, was, almost, completely, abolished, when, 'MadMyc,', a, competitive, 'Myc', 'inhibitor,', was]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([simultaneously])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Tet-On', induction, of, 'MadMyc', in, preneoplastic, cells, significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, progression, of, 'AKT/HRAS-induced', 'tumours;', its, induction, in, transformed, cells, suppressed, their, proliferative, activity, with, alterations, in, lipid, metabolism, and, protein, translation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Examination', of, the, 'dose-responses', of, 'Myc', in, the, enhancement, of, 'AKT/HRAS-induced', tumorigenesis, revealed, that, a, reduction, to, 'one-third']), verbo([retained]), complemento([enhancing, effect, but, 'three-times', greater, introduction, damped, the, process, with, increased, apoptosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Myc', overexpression]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, mRNA, expression, of, proteins, involved, in, the, synthesis, of, fatty, 'acids,', and, when, combined, with, 'HRAS', 'introduction,', it, also, suppressed, the, mRNA, expression, complemento([the, 'promoter/enhancer', activity, of, the, 'Mir122', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, neonatal, but, not, adult, 'EpCAM(+)', 'LPCs']), verbo([have]), complemento([great, potential, to, produce, 'albumin(+)', hepatocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['GRHL2']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([transcription, of, miR122, and, thereby, restricts, the, differentiation, potential, of, adult, 'LPCs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rodent', cancer, bioassays, indicate, that, the, aryl, hydrocarbon, receptor, '(', 'AHR)', 'agonist,', 2, ',', 3, ',', 7, ',', 8, -, 'tetracholorodibenzo-p-dioxin', '(', 'TCDD),']), verbo([causes]), complemento([increases, in, both, hepatocytic, and, cholangiocytic, tumors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Effects', of, 'AHR', activation]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, evaluated, on, rodent, hepatic, stem, cells, '(', 'rHpSCs)', versus, their, 'descendants,', hepatoblasts, '(', 'rHBs),', two, lineage, stages, of, rapid]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, viability, of, 'rHBs,', even, though, the, culture, 'conditions,', in, the, absence, of, the, 'agonists,', were, permissive, for, survival, and, expansion, of, verbo([increased]), complemento([frequency, of, liver, tumors])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', risk, of, hepatocellular, carcinoma, '(', 'HCC)', development]), verbo([increases]), complemento([as, hepatitis, virus, 'C', '(', 'HCV)-related', liver, diseases, 'progress,', especially, in, patients, with, active, inflammation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Insight', into, hepatic, carcinogenesis]), verbo([have]), complemento([emerged, from, recent, detailed, analyses, of, transforming, growth, 'factor-β', and, 'c-Jun-N-terminal', kinase, signaling, processes, directed, by, multiple, selective, therapeutic]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([of, 'PGC1α-dependent', 'LRH-1', signaling, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'FAK', depletion, in, of, several, 'cancer-related', genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Among', these, 'genes,', we, showed, that, 'FAK', silencing]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([transcription, and, nuclear, localization, of, enhancer, of, zeste, homolog, 2, '(', 'EZH2)', and, its, 'tri-methylation', activity, on, lysine, 27, of, histone, 'H3', '(', 'H3K27me3)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', 'FAK', silencing, downregulated, both, 'EZH2']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, histone, 'H3K27me3', levels, at, the, promoter, of, its, target, gene, 'NOTCH2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, pharmacological, inhibition, of, 'FAK', activity, resembled, these, effects, although, milder])]). relacion([sujeto(['Since', interactome, analysis, of, diseases, verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, receive, significant, improvements, in, blood, glucose, 'levels,', lipid, 'levels,', and, liver, function, after, sitagliptin, 'treatment,', although, the, complemento([with, reduced, 'OS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', multivariable, 'analysis,', residual, disease, after, surgery, '(', 'R2', 'resection)', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 14.5, 'months)', 'EOM', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, have, better, 'OS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Similar', to, oligometastatic, 'CRC', to, the, lung, or, 'liver,', surgical, resection, of, complemento([modes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', dramatic, repositioning, is, influenced, by, a, differential, ability, to, establish, stable, 'face-to-face', 'π-π-stacking', with, the, 'LRH-1', complemento([failed, to, yield, 'high-efficiency', chemical, probes, for, many, of, the, 48, human, nuclear, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, investigated, whether, 'disulfide-trapping,', an, approach, new, to]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['receptors,', would, provide, effective, lead, compounds, targeting, human, liver, receptor, homolog, 1, '(', 'hLRH-1,', 'NR5A2)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Despite', the, fact, that, 'hLRH-1', contains, a, large, ligand]), verbo([binding]), complemento([pocket, and, binds, phospholipids, with, high, 'affinity,', existing, synthetic, 'hLRH-1', ligands, are, of, limited, utility, due, to, poor, 'solubility,', low, efficacy, or, significant, 'off-target', effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', 'disulfide-trapping,', we, identified, a]), verbo([lead]), complemento([compound, that, conjugates, with, remarkably, 'high-efficiency', to, a, native, cysteine, residue, '(', 'Cys346)', lining, the, hydrophobic, cavity, in, the, ligand, binding, domain, of, 'hLRH-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Guided', by, computational, modeling, and, cellular, 'assays,', the]), verbo([lead]), complemento([compound, was, elaborated, into, ligands, 'PME8', and, 'PME9', that, bind, 'hLRH-1', reversibly, '(', no, cysteine, 'reactivity)', and, increase, 'hLRH-1', activity, in, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', compared, with, the, existing, 'hLRH-1', synthetic, agonist, 'RJW100,', both, 'PME8', and, 'PME9', showed, comparable, induction, of, the, 'LRH-1', dependent]), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, 'CYP24A1', in, human, 'HepG2', 'cells,', beginning, as, early, as, 3, h, after, drug, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data, show, that, 'PME8', and, 'PME9', are, potent, activators, of, 'hLRH-1', and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, with, further, development, this, lead, series, may, yield, useful, chemical, probes, for, manipulating, 'LRH-1', activity, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', 'average,', more, than, 700, differentially]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([genes, '(', 'DEGs)', were, identified, of, which, 146, are, mechanistically, linked, to, 'LD', formation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', identified, 51, 'LD-associated', 'DEGs', frequently]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, patient, samples, '(', range, '≥5', to, '≤102)', with, the, 'liver-receptor', 'homolog-1(NR5A2),', that, 'is,', a, key, regulator, of, cholesterol, metabolism, being, commonly, repressed, among, 100, patients, examined])]). relacion([sujeto(['With', bland, 'steatosis,', notable, regulations]), verbo([involved]), complemento(['hypoxia-inducible', lipid, 'droplet-associated-protein', and, 'diacylglycerol-O-acyltransferase-2', renowned, for, their, role, in, 'LD-growth'])]). 'hypoxia-inducible', lipid, 'droplet-associated-protein', being, confirmed, by, immunofluorescence, microscopy])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', steatosis, and, steatohepatitis, specific, gene, regulations, informed, on, the, pathogenesis, of, 'NAFLD', to, broaden, the, perspective, of]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapies])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, identify, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, liver, receptor, homolog, 1, '(', 'LRH-1)', as, a, key, regulator, in, the, process, of, hepatic, tumorigenesis, through, the, coordination, of, a, 'LRH-1', modulate, the, expression, and, activity, of, mitochondrial, glutaminase, 2, '(', 'GLS2),', the, first, and, 'rate-limiting', step, of, this, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', robust, reduction, in, glutaminolysis, and, the, limiting, availability, of, 'α-ketoglutarate', in, turn]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([mTORC1, signaling, to, eventually, block, cell, growth, and, verbo([promote]), complemento([hepatocellular, carcinogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, that, 'Methyl-CpG', binding, protein, 2, '(', 'MeCP2)', had, a, high, expression, in, liver, fibrosis, and, played, a, central, role, in, its, pathobiology])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, a, cryptolepine, complemento([cancer, cells, chemoresistance, are, still, not, clear])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento(['LRH1', levels, were, significantly, elevated, in, primary, relacion([sujeto(['There', is, no, previous, study, in, the, literature, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([examined, the, relationship, between, circulating, vitamin, 'K1', '(', 'VK1)', with, complemento([proteins, responsible, for, solubilizing, phosphoinositides, were, 'identified,', steroidogenic, 'factor-1', '(', 'SF-1;', 'NR5A1)', and, liver, receptor, 'homolog-1', '(', 'LRH-1;', 'LXRα-dependent', transcription, of, lipogenic, 'genes,', such, as, sterol, regulatory, element, binding, 'protein-1c', '(', 'SREBP-1c),', fatty, acid, 'synthase,', and, stearoyl, 'CoA', desaturase, 'RCT'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, assays, revealed, that, 'PPT']), verbo([repressed]), complemento([recruitment, of, the, lipogenic, coactivator, 'TRAP80', to, the, but]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, yet, been, demonstrated, in, goat, mammary, epithelial, cells, '(', 'GMEC)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, 'SREBF1', was, modest, in, mammary, 'Ad-nSREBP1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Compared', with, 'Ad-GFP', cells, '(', 'control),', 'Ad-nSREBP1', cells, had, a, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, expression, of, genes, related, 'C16:0', and, 'C18:1', 'increased,', whereas, that, of, 'C16:1,', 'C18:0,', and, 'C18:2']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, 'Ad-nSREBP1', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overall,', the, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([strong, support, for, a, central, role, of, 'SREBP1', in, the, regulation, of, milk, fat, synthesis, in, goat, mammary, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nuclear', hormone, receptor, liver, 'X', 'receptor-alpha', '(', 'LXRα)']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, vital, role, in, cholesterol, homeostasis, and, is, reported, to, have, a, role, in, adipose, function, and, obesity, although, this, is, controversial])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,', mesenchymal, stem, cells, '(', 'MSCs)', are]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([to, be, a, major, source, of, relacion([sujeto(['Oxidative', stress]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['macroautophagy/autophagy', and, contributes, to, atherogenesis, via, lipophagic, 'flux,', a, form, of, lipid, removal, by, relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, the, antioxidant, 'PRDX1', '(', peroxiredoxin, 1, ')']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, crucial, role, in, the, maintenance, of, lipophagic, flux, in, macrophages])]). relacion([sujeto(['PRDX1', is, more, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([than, other, antioxidant, enzymes, in, monocytes, and, macrophages])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', perturbation, in, cholesterol, homeostasis, was, due, to, impaired, lipophagic, cholesterol, hydrolysis]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, excessive, oxidative, 'stress,', resulting, in, the, 'BM-transplanted', recipients])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, 'PRDX1', is, crucial, to, regulating, lipophagic, flux, and, maintaining, macrophage, cholesterol, homeostasis, against, oxidative, stress])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'PRDX1-dependent', control, of, oxidative, stress, may, provide, a, strategy, for, treating, atherosclerosis, and, 'autophagy-related', human, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Diabesity', and, fatty, liver]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, associated, with, low, levels, of, which, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cholesterol, trafficking, into, 'bile,', as, well, as, other, 'LXR', 'targets,', could, be, compromised, in, the, livers, of, obese, individuals])]). observed, postoperatively, in, morbidly, obese, 'patients,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, similar, 'LXR', impairment, in, these, patients])]). relacion([sujeto(['Post-prandial', hyperlipidemia]), verbo([has]), complemento([emerged, as, a, cardiovascular, risk, factor, with, limited, therapeutic, options])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Liver', 'X', receptors, '(', 'Lxrs)', are]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptors, that, regulate, cholesterol, elimination])]). relacion([sujeto(['Knowledge', of, their, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, absorption, and, handling, of, dietary, fats, is, incomplete])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, conducted, a, 'long-term', 'high-cholesterol', dietary, challenge, in, adults, to, examine, the, chronic, effect, of]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([nr1h3, gene, dose, on, the, development, of, hypercholesterolemia, and, hepatic, lipid, accumulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Over-expression', of, 'Lxrα', in, the, intestine, delays, the, transport, of, ingested, lipids, in, 'larvae,', while, deletion, of, 'Lxrα']), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, rate, of, lipid, transport])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', whether, the, tumor, 'LXR', expression]), verbo([has]), complemento([prognostic, significance, in, hepatocellular, carcinoma, '(', 'HCC)', patient, has, not, been, verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, kappa, '(', 'NFκB),', 'Matrix', metalloproteinases, 2, and, 9, '(', 'MMP-2', and, -, 9, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, than, those, with, high, 'LXR', level])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', in, vitro, data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'HCC', cell, lines, had, increased, 'NF-κB,', 'MMP2,', 'MMP9', and, invasive, complemento([tumor, behaves])]). relacion([sujeto(['Allicin,', a, major, component, of, 'garlic,', is, regarded, as, a, cardioprotective, agent, and, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, complemento([by, 'LXRα', siRNA, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', allicin]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['NF-E2-related', factor, 2, '(', 'Nrf2),', which, controls, the, defense, substitution, with, fat, and, fiber])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', revealed, the, 'fine-tuned', regulation, of, many, hepatic, genes, encoding, key, enzymes, driving, glycogenesis, and, de, novo, fatty, acid, synthesis, pathways, and, of, some, genes]), verbo([participating]), complemento([in, oxidation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Among', the, genes]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([upon, consumption, of, a, 'high-fat,', 'high-fiber', 'diet,', we, highlighted, 'CPT1A,', which, encodes, a, key, enzyme, in, the, regulation, of, fatty, acid, oxidation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,', the, repression, of, lipogenic, genes, by, the, 'high-fat', diet, was, clearly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, 'down-regulation', of, 'SREBF1', transcripts, but, was, not, associated, with, the, transcript, regulation, of, 'MLXIPL', and, 'NR1H3,', which, are, both, transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', result]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([a, pivotal, role, for, 'SREBF1', in, lipogenesis, regulation, in, response, to, a, decrease, in, dietary, starch, and, an, increase, in, dietary, 'PUFA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Other', prospective, regulators, of, de, novo, nutrients, in, their, 'diets,', at, least, at, the, transcriptional, level])]). relacion([sujeto(['As', the, most, abundant, flavonoid, in, 'Ampelopsis', 'grossedentata,', the, protective, effects, of, dihydromyricetin, on, atherosclerosis]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, well, 'established,', yet, the, detailed, mechanisms, are, not, fully, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['Incubation', complemento([with, risk, of, 'UC', '(', 'OR:', 1.31, ',', 95, '%', 'CI:', 1.03, -, 1.66, ',', 'P', =, 0.03, ',', 'OR:', 2.3, ',', 95, '%', 'CI:', 1.04, -, 5.08, ',', 'P', =, 0.04, ',', and, 'OR:', their, important, roles, in, glucose, metabolism, and, particularly, 'LXRbeta', is, important, for, proper, insulin, production, in, pancreas])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, glucose, induces, transcription, via, the, 'LXRB', gene, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', transcription, start, site, of, the, human, 'LXRB', gene, was, determined, and, we, identified, two, highly, 'conserved,', and, 'functional,', 'ETS', and, 'Elk1']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['sites,', 'respectively,', in, the, 'LXRB', gene, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Elk1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, also, bound, the, serum, responsive, factor, '(', 'SRF)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', mutation, of, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, or, siRNA, knockdown, of, 'SRF', and, 'Elk1', significantly, reduced, the, promoter, activity, and, impaired, the, glucose, response])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptor, superfamily])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', oral, administration, of, 'LXR', agonists, to, mice, results, in, elevated, hepatic, 'glucose)', compared, with, normoglycemic, conditions, '(', 5.5, '\240\mmol/L', 'glucose)', or, normoglycemic, conditions, with, high, osmotic, pressure, '(', 5.5, '\240\mmol/L', glucose, +, 10.0, '\240\mmol/L', 'mannitol)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nr1h2', mRNA, and, protein, expression, were]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([by, treatment, with, 'TNF-α', plus, 'CaPO4', but, were, restored, are, activated, by, cholesterol, derivatives])]). relacion([sujeto(['They']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, implicated, in, preeclampsia, because, they, modulate, trophoblast, invasion, and, verbo([increased]), complemento([in, the, 'NG', group, but, not, in, the, 'HG', group, during, macrophage, activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', 'Glut', expression, was, unaffected, by, that, potentially]), verbo([act]), complemento([via, this, element])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data, demonstrate, that, a, widely, active, 'LCR', module, can, synergize, with, other, 'LCR', components, to, produce, 'tissue-specific', 'LCR', activity, through, differential, protein, occupancy, and, function, and]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, to, support, a, role, for, this, 'LCR', module, in, the, regulation, of, both, 'TCR', and, 'Dad1', genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Nuclear', 'Factor-kappaB', '(', 'NF-kappaB)', family, of, transcription, factors, are, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([and, control, a, wide, range, of, cellular, 'responses,', including, 'apoptosis,', 'proliferation,', 'differentiation,', inflammation, and, immunity])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', failure, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([involution, was, associated, with, reduced, 'expression,', within, 24, hours, of, 'involution,', of, the, death, receptor, '(', 'DR)', ligand, 'TNF', and, its, receptor, 'TNFR1,', which, are, known, 'NF-kappaB', targets])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, elevated, levels, of, active, 'AKT', and, phosphorylated, 'FOXO3a'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Unlike', other, 'DR', 'ligands,', the, 'TWEAK', promoter]), verbo([has]), complemento([six, consensus, 'FOXO-binding', 'sites,', further, suggesting, that, it, is, differentially, regulated])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', unexpected, function, of, the, 'IKK2/NF-kappaB', pathway, as, a, regulator, of, 'TWEAK', expression, and, inducer, of, apoptosis]), verbo([has]), complemento([significant, consequences, for, future, therapeutic, approaches, for, cancer, and, inflammatory, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Through', its, transcriptional, 'activities,', the, 'proto-oncoprotein', 'c-Jun', can]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([cellular, 'proliferation,', 'survival,', and, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([established, a, novel, yeast, assay, that, screens, for, repressors, of, 'c-Jun', transcriptional, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', screen]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, identification, of, a, ubiquitously, expressed, novel, 'RING', zinc, finger, 'protein,', termed, 'Makorin', 'RING', zinc, finger, protein, 1, '(', 'MKRN1),', recently, shown, to, act, as, an, 'E3', ubiquitin, ligase])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'MKRN1', in, mammalian, cells]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, transcriptional, activities, of, not, only, 'c-Jun,', but, also, the, nuclear, 'receptors,', the, androgen, 'receptor,', and, the, retinoic, acid, receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Truncation', analysis, indicates, that, both, the, amino, and, carboxy, termini, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, this, transrepression, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, that, 'MKRN1']), verbo([has]), complemento([transcriptional, activity, and, suggest, that, its, transrepression, and, transactivation, functions, are, mediated, by, the, same, mechanism])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', 'MKRN1', may, represent, a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([protein, with, multiple, nuclear, 'functions,', including, regulating, 'RNA', polymerase, 'II-catalyzed', transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['Various', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, the, insulin, receptor, '(', 'IR)', is, increased, in, most, human, breast, 'cancers,', and, both, 'ligand-dependent', malignant, transformation, and, increased, cell, growth, occur, in, cultured, breast, cells, overexpressing, the, 'IR'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', although, numerous, in, vivo, and, in, vitro, observations]), verbo([have]), complemento([indicated, an, important, contributory, role, for, the, 'IR', in, breast, cancer, cell, 'biology,', the, molecular, mechanisms, accounting, for, increased, 'IR', expression, in, breast, tumors, have, not, previously, been, elucidated])]). relacion([sujeto(['Herein,', we, did, immunoblot, analyses, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([protein, from, cultured, breast, cancer, cells, and, normal, and, tumoral, tissues, from, breast, cancer, patients, combined, with, 'HMGA1)', 'protein,', the, developmentally, regulated, activator, 'protein-2', '(', 'AP-2)', transcription, factor, and, the, ubiquitously, expressed, transcription, factor, 'Sp1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', cultured, breast, cancer, cells, and, human, breast, cancer, 'specimens,', the, expression, of, 'AP-2', was, significantly, higher, than, that, observed, in, cells, and, 'P1-1', '(', 'GSTP1-1)', is, an, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([protein, that, plays, an, important, role, in, the, detoxification, and, xenobiotics, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, that, 'GSTP1-1', interacts, with, 'c-Jun', 'NH(2)-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', and, suppresses, its, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, novel, function, of, 'GSTP1-1', in, regulating, tumor, necrosis, 'factor-alpha', '(', 'TNF-alpha)-triggered', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['Aromatic', hydrocarbon]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocator, '(', 'Arnt)', is, an, ubiquitously, expressed, protein, that, contains, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', '(', able, to, bind, 'hypoxia-responsive', 'DNA', elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['Given', that, the, expression, of, 'Arnt', is, 'limited,', 'HIF-1alpha', may, compete, with, 'AhR', for]), verbo([recruiting]), complemento(['Arnt', as, a, heteromeric, partner])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', major, question, remaining, in, glycobiology, is, how, a, glycosyltransferase, '(', 'GT)', that]), verbo([retains]), complemento([the, anomeric, linkage, of, a, sugar, catalyzes, the, reaction])]). relacion([sujeto(['Xyloside', 'α-1,3-xylosyltransferase', '(', 'XXYLT1)', is, a]), verbo([retaining]), complemento(['GT', that, regulates, 'Notch', receptor, activation, by, adding, xylose, to, the, 'Notch', extracellular, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', using, natural, verbo([retaining]), complemento([mechanism, for, 'XXYLT1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', the, epidermal, growth, 'factor-like', repeat, acceptor, substrate, undergoes, a, large, understanding, of, this]), verbo([retaining]), complemento([enzyme, will, accelerate, the, design, of, retaining, 'GT', inhibitors, that, can, modulate, 'Notch', activity, in, pathological, situations, in, which, 'Notch', dysregulation, is, known, to, cause, cancer, or, developmental, disorders])]). relacion([sujeto(['Tuberculosis', '(', 'TB)']), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'Mycobacterium', tuberculosis, '(', 'Mtb)', represents, one, of, the, greatest, threats, to, human, health])]). relacion([sujeto([',', 'Interferons', '(', 'IFNs)', in, combination, with, the, 'first-line', of, 'anti-TB', drugs]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, used, for, treating, 'TB', for, decades, in, the, 'clinic,', but, how, 'Mtb', infection, regulates, 'interferon-stimulated', relacion([sujeto(['Additionally,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, cytosolic, cyclic, '(', 'GMP-AMP)', synthase, '(', 'cGAS),', 'toll-like', 'receptor-2', '(', 'TLR-2)', and, 'TLR-4', were, selectively, involved, in, 'Mtb-mediated', 'ISG', production])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therapeutic', medications, for, the, treatment, of, depression]), verbo([have]), complemento([serious, 'limitations,', particularly, delayed, onset, and, low, rates, of, efficacy])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, discovery, that, a, single, subanesthetic, dose, of, 'ketamine,', a, glutamate, 'treatment-resistant,']), verbo([has]), complemento([invigorated, the, field])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', addition, to, these, remarkable, 'actions,', ketamine]), verbo([has]), complemento([proven, effective, for, the, treatment, of, suicidal, ideation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Efforts', are, under, way, to, develop, 'ketamine-like', drugs, with, fewer, side, effects, as, well, as, agents, that]), may]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, maturation, of, its, mRNA])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, that, the, inherited, factors, may, play, a, complemento([genes, were, 'MMP9,', 'LIF,', 'SOD2,', 'BCL2A1,', 'MMP12,', and, 'HSPA6'])]). relacion([sujeto(['[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]4-DAMP', is, a, radioligand, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, used, to, quantify, levels, of, the, muscarinic, receptor, 'CHRM3', protein, in, situ])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', in, addition, to, high, affinity]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'S-OHC-induced', 'RIPK1', phosphorylation, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, neither, 'α-Toc', nor, 'α-Toc3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'CaMKII', phosphorylation]), 'CaMKII', activation, is, involved, in, the, mechanism, of, 24, 'S-OHC-induced', cell, death, and, that, 'Toc', inhibits, the, cell, death, via, inhibition, of, 'CaMKII', activation, through, a, 'RIPK1', 'phosphorylation-independent', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Gastric', cancer, '(', 'GC)', is, one, of, the, most, common, cancers, and, is, the, 'second-leading']), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, 'cancer-associated', morbidity, worldwide])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, levels, of, 24, '(', 'R/S),25-EC', and, 27, 'HC', in, human, subjects])]). relacion([sujeto(['Compared', with, normal, gastric, mucosal, 'tissue,', the, levels, of, sulfated, 25, -, hydroxycholesterol, '(', 25, 'HC3S)', and, the, ratio, of, 25, 'HC3S/25HC', disturbed, fatty, acid, profile, was, observed, with, 7, 'β-OHC,', similar, fatty, acid, profiles, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, control, cells, and, in, cells, cultured, with, 7, 'β-OHC', rate, of, 'HCV', 'infection,', viral, genotype, and, the, host, genetic, background, influence, both, the, immune, response, and, lipid, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'context,', recent, evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, that, cholesterol, and, its, derivatives, such, as, oxysterols, might, modulate, and, potentialize, the, hepatic, innate, immune, response, including, 'oxysterols)', are, endogenous, molecules]), verbo([synthesized]), complemento([in, the, nervous, system, from, cholesterol, that, can, modulate, glutamate, and, 'GABA', 'receptors,', the, neurotransmitter, systems, contribute, to, the, pathogenesis, of, 'AD', and, 'glaucoma,', 'NSs', are, possible, therapeutic]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, these, disorders])]). relacion([sujeto(['ApoE-/-/LDLR-/-', mice, developed, hypercholesterolemia, accompanied, by]), verbo([increased]), complemento([circulating, levels, of, 'P-selectin', and, 'Eng', and, a, disruption, of, 'NO', metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto([7, 'K']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['Eng', expression, via, 'Krüppel-like', factor, 6, '(', 'KLF6),', liver, 'X', nuclear, 'receptor,', and, 'NF-κB', relacion([sujeto(['They', typically]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, modular, structure, comprising, a, 'lipid-binding', domain, and, membrane, targeting, 'determinants,', being, thus, suited, for, function, at, membrane, contact, sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['ORP2', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([ubiquitously, and, has, been, assigned, a, multitude, of, functions])]). and, 'F-actin-dependent', 'functions,']), verbo([revealed]), complemento([a, bewildering, spectrum, of, activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['Under', pathological, 'conditions,', cholesterol, oxidation, this, paper, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, interaction, between, 7, 'α-', 'hydroxycholesterol,', 7, 'α-OH', '(', one, of, the, most, abundant, oxysterol, in, human, 'body)', relacion([sujeto(['Although', 'FGF19', messenger, 'RNA', '(', 'mRNA)', is, virtually, absent, in, normal, 'liver,', 'FGF19', mRNA, was, strongly]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['(', 31, -, fold, to, 374, -, 'fold,', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, ')', in, the, liver, of, cholestatic, patients, in, comparison, with, drained, and, control, patients])]). relacion([sujeto(['Alterations', in, transcripts, activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['Constitutive', androstane, receptor, '(', 'CAR),', a, member, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['family,', plays, an, important, role, in, cholesterol, and, bile, 'differentiation,', sphere, 'formation,', and, population, size])]). relacion([sujeto(['RXR', &, 'amp;', 'RAR', were]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'ALDH+', colonic, 'SCs,', but, not, in, and, 'ALDH+', 'SC', population, 'size,', and, induced, differentiation, along, the, neuroendocrine, cell, '(', 'NEC)', lineage])]). relacion([sujeto(['Retinoid', 'signaling,', by]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['ALDH+', colonic, 'CSCs,', decreases, 'SC', 'proliferation,', sphere, 'formation,', and, population, 'size,', and, increases, 'SC', differentiation, to, 'NECs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['That', retinoid, receptors, 'RXR', and, 'RAR', are, selectively]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'ALDH+', 'SCs', indicates, 'RA', signaling, mainly, occurs, via, 'ALDH+', 'SCs,', which, provides, a, mechanism, to, selectively, target, 'CSCs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', of, the, 'agonists,', possessing, a, rare, 'non-acidic', 'chemotype,', revealed, high, selectivity, on, 12]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, and, comparable, efficacy, as, bexarotene, on, induction, of, 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, 'A1,', angiopoietin, like, protein, 4, and, apolipoprotein, 'E'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'work,', we, show, that, 'structure-based', drug, discovery]), verbo([involving]), complemento([computational, modeling, can, be, used, to, identify, a, new, retinoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'RXR)', agonist, ligand, with, a, 'bis(indolyl)methane', scaffold])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'Nano-RXR', was, not, only, able, to]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([metabolic, and, transporter, genes, related, to, orphan, nuclear, receptors, but, also, played, a, major, role, in, modulating, programmed, cell, death, in, sarcomas, developed, in, 'Oncopigs'])]).
